original: @112a rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @112a rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sarba ta th'a ga ta pud tro phu na gu hya ba no shi aa shvad da ma bi na sa ma h'a tantra n'a ma /
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga ta pud tro phu na gu hya ba no shi aa shvad da ma bi na sa ma h'a tantra n'a ma /
translated: Sarva-tathagata-putrophunaguhyamaha-ashvadatmabinasa-mahatantra-nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa gsang ba rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa gsang ba rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba /
translated: The Great Tantra of the Supreme Horse Play of the Unsurpassed Secret Intention of All Tathagatas, Called The Taming of Mara

original: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la @112b phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la @112b phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to glorious Vajrasattva.

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard at one time:

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po phyogs bcu dang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i 'byung gnas; sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje gsang ba gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po phyogs bcu dang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i 'byung gnas; sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje gsang ba gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa /
translated: The Blessed One, the great bliss vajra, the source of all buddhas of the ten directions and three times, the secret vajra of enlightened body, speech, mind, qualities, and activities, superior to others,

original: mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pas spras pa /
analyzed: mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pas spras pa /
translated: adorned with the perfect major and minor marks,

original: bkod pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor lhun po brtsegs shing yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas sna tshogs rnam par snang ba'i ngo bo /
analyzed: bkod pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor lhun po brtsegs shing yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas sna tshogs rnam par snang ba'i ngo bo /
translated: the essence of the array of the mandala of the stacked-up Meru, the source of various precious qualities, appearing in various ways,

original: zab pa dang rgya che ba'i yan lag thams cad gsal bar byed cing ye shes kyi tshogs kyis chos ma lus pa mthar phyin pa /🔽kun tu 'phrin las rgya cher 'phrul pa'i bdag nyid dpal bde byed padma gar gyi dbang phyug chags pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin brnyes pa med pa'i chos nyid kyis thams cad la dbang bskur ba de nyid lha thams cad 'du ba'i gnas gzhal yas khang par du
analyzed: zab pa dang rgya che ba'i yan lag thams cad gsal bar byed cing ye shes kyi tshogs kyis chos ma lus pa mthar phyin pa / kun tu 'phrin las rgya cher 'phrul pa'i bdag nyid dpal bde byed padma gar gyi dbang phyug chags pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin brnyes pa med pa'i chos nyid kyis thams cad la dbang bskur ba de nyid lha thams cad 'du ba'i gnas gzhal yas khang par du
translated: It is the nature of the great emanation of enlightened activity, the glorious Padma Gargyi Wangchug, who has attained the samadhi of great passion and has perfected all the dharmas through the accumulation of wisdom.

original: gyur pa / 'og min rdo rje lhun po'i gnas ye shes kyi snang ba rin po che sna tshogs ni /
analyzed: gyur pa / 'og min rdo rje lhun po'i gnas ye shes kyi snang ba rin po che sna tshogs ni /
translated: The palace, which is the place where all the deities gather, is the Akanishta Vajra Meru Palace, which is the appearance of wisdom and is made of various precious substances.

original: 'od 'bar ba'i khang bzang 'dod pa'i yon tan gzugs sdug pa sna tshogs dang / dri zhim pa sna tshogs dang / ro bro ba sna tshogs dang / reg bya 'jam pa sna tshogs dang / chos kyi bde ba bskyed pa sna tshogs phyogs bcur 'phro zhing 'khrigs pa rtse mo mtho zhing khyams kyi rnam par phye bar sgo bzhi sgo khang dang bcas par bzhugs so //
analyzed: 'od 'bar ba'i khang bzang 'dod pa'i yon tan gzugs sdug pa sna tshogs dang / dri zhim pa sna tshogs dang / ro bro ba sna tshogs dang / reg bya 'jam pa sna tshogs dang / chos kyi bde ba bskyed pa sna tshogs phyogs bcur 'phro zhing 'khrigs pa rtse mo mtho zhing khyams kyi rnam par phye bar sgo bzhi sgo khang dang bcas par bzhugs so //
translated: The palace of blazing light is filled with the various beautiful forms of the sense pleasures, the various sweet scents, the various delicious tastes, the various soft textures, and the various pleasures of Dharma that radiate and swirl in the ten directions. The palace has high peaks and is divided into courtyards with four gates and gatehouses.

original: de'i @113a *// tshe bde bar gshegs pa'i rol pa chen po kun tu snang ba dang / 'od kyi dpal dang / dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang / cho 'phrul bkod pa dang / rnam par gzigs dang / mi bskyod rdo rje dang / mngon par snang ba dang /
analyzed: de'i @113a *// tshe bde bar gshegs pa'i rol pa chen po kun tu snang ba dang / 'od kyi dpal dang / dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang / cho 'phrul bkod pa dang / rnam par gzigs dang / mi bskyod rdo rje dang / mngon par snang ba dang /
translated: At that time, the great display of the sugatas was seen: Samantaprabhāsa, Śrīprabhā, Nandīśvara, Prabhāva, Vipaśyin, Akṣobhya, Abhāsvara,

original: brtan pa'i dbang phyug dang / 'brug sgra dang / dri ma med pa dang / rin chen phung po dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / rin chen dra ba dang / dkon mchog mtshan dang / rin chen tog dang / 'od zer snang ba dang /
analyzed: brtan pa'i dbang phyug dang / 'brug sgra dang / dri ma med pa dang / rin chen phung po dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / rin chen dra ba dang / dkon mchog mtshan dang / rin chen tog dang / 'od zer snang ba dang /
translated: Sthiraśrī, Meghagarjita, Vimalagarbha, Ratna-skandha, Gaganakośa, Ratna-jāla, Ratnamudrā, Ratna-ketu, Raśmi-prabhāsa,

original: tshe mtha' yas dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / chags pa med pa'i 'od dang / dga' ba'i spyan dang / don thams cad yod pa dang / brtson 'grus shugs can dang / las chen 'phrul las dang / gnod sbyin 'dul ba dang / sna tshogs dbang phyug go /
analyzed: tshe mtha' yas dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / chags pa med pa'i 'od dang / dga' ba'i spyan dang / don thams cad yod pa dang / brtson 'grus shugs can dang / las chen 'phrul las dang / gnod sbyin 'dul ba dang / sna tshogs dbang phyug go /
translated: Amitāyus, Dharmeśvara, Asangaprabha, Nanda-netra, Sarvārthasiddha, Vīryavega, Mahā-karma-vikurvita, Yakṣa-dāmana, and Viśveśvara.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba'i blo gros dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs dang / gzi brjid bkod pa dang / 'khor lo rnon pa dang / shes snang ba dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / 'od zer 'phro ba dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba'i blo gros dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs dang / gzi brjid bkod pa dang / 'khor lo rnon pa dang / shes snang ba dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / 'od zer 'phro ba dang /
translated: Moreover, there were the bodhisattva mahāsattvas Sukhamati, Sāgara-nirghoṣa, Tejorāja, Cakra-tīkṣṇa, Jñāna-āloka, Vajra-dhvaja, Raśmi-jāla,

original: drag shul can dang / dri ma sems dpa' dang / sgyu ma'i sprul pa dang / rin chen rgyal po dang / dri ba can dang / lag bzang dang / gser 'od 'phro ba dang / rin chen snye ma dang / chos kyis mtho ba dang /🔽dri ma med pa dang / mun pa sel ba dang / dga' ba'i dbyangs dang / gzhon @113b nu rin chen dang / rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang / gar mkhan dang / bro'i rgya mtsho dang / thogs med bkod pa dang / padmo dga' ba dang /
analyzed: drag shul can dang / dri ma sems dpa' dang / sgyu ma'i sprul pa dang / rin chen rgyal po dang / dri ba can dang / lag bzang dang / gser 'od 'phro ba dang / rin chen snye ma dang / chos kyis mtho ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / mun pa sel ba dang / dga' ba'i dbyangs dang / gzhon @113b nu rin chen dang / rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang / gar mkhan dang / bro'i rgya mtsho dang / thogs med bkod pa dang / padmo dga' ba dang /
translated: Tejorāśi, Vimalatejas, Māyānirmita, Ratna­rāja, Praśnā, Subāhu, Suvarṇaprabhāsa, Ratna­mukuṭa, Dharmeśvara,🔽Vimalā, Tamonud, Ratikirti, Kumāraratna, Vajra­vikrama, Nāṭī, Nṛtyasāgara, Asangavyūha, Padmaprabha,

original: sa li dbang phyug dang / rin chen spungs pa dang / sprin gyi phreng ba dang / yid 'ong me tog dang / ye shes sgron ma dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / kha lo sgyur ba dang / dran pa'i dbang phyug dang / padma'i blo gros dang /
analyzed: sa li dbang phyug dang / rin chen spungs pa dang / sprin gyi phreng ba dang / yid 'ong me tog dang / ye shes sgron ma dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / kha lo sgyur ba dang / dran pa'i dbang phyug dang / padma'i blo gros dang /
translated: Śailendra, Ratna­rāśi, Meghamālā, Priyagandha, Jñānolkā, Pratibhānakūṭa, Sārthavāha, Smṛtiśūra, Padmamati,

original: las byed pa'i stobs dang / snying po blo gros rnams so //
analyzed: las byed pa'i stobs dang / snying po blo gros rnams so //
translated: and Karmabalendraratna.

original: de dag kun kyang rang rang gi btsun mo'i tshogs dang 'khril pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs so //🔽gzhan yang padmo 'phro ba dang / padma 'dzin pa dang / padma sgrog pa dang / padma bskyod pa dang / padma tshim byed dang / padma 'thor ba dang / padma snang ba dang / padma dbang byed rnams kyang rang rang gi 'phrin las kyis bkod do //
analyzed: de dag kun kyang rang rang gi btsun mo'i tshogs dang 'khril pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs so // gzhan yang padmo 'phro ba dang / padma 'dzin pa dang / padma sgrog pa dang / padma bskyod pa dang / padma tshim byed dang / padma 'thor ba dang / padma snang ba dang / padma dbang byed rnams kyang rang rang gi 'phrin las kyis bkod do //
translated: All of them are in union with their respective queens.🔽Moreover, there are the following: Padmo Trowa, Padma Dzinpa, Padma Drokpa, Padma Khyodpa, Padma Tsimbye, Padma Torwa, Padma Nangwa, and Padma Wangchug. Each of them is arrayed by his own enlightened activity.

original: gzhan yang 'jigs byed chen po byams pa'i dbang phyug brtse ba'i dbang phyug dang / pad grol dbang phyug dang / grol ba'i dbang phyug dang / sbyin pa'i dbang phyug dang / spyod pa'i dbang phyug dang / smra ba'i dbang phyug dang / mthun pa'i dbang phyug kyang rang rang gi rig pa bcas pas 'khod do //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'jigs byed chen po byams pa'i dbang phyug brtse ba'i dbang phyug dang / pad grol dbang phyug dang / grol ba'i dbang phyug dang / sbyin pa'i dbang phyug dang / spyod pa'i dbang phyug dang / smra ba'i dbang phyug dang / mthun pa'i dbang phyug kyang rang rang gi rig pa bcas pas 'khod do //
translated: Moreover, there are the following: Champa Wangchug, Trewang Wangchug, Pema Drolwai Wangchug, Drolwai Wangchug, Jinpai Wangchug, Chopai Wangchug, Drampai Wangchug, and Thungwai Wangchug. Each of them is seated with his own consort.

original: de dag la sogs pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnam par 'byed pa dang / 'byed pa med par snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
analyzed: de dag la sogs pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnam par 'byed pa dang / 'byed pa med par snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
translated: The Bhagavān was dwelling together with a retinue of twelve hundred thousand assemblies of buddhas and bodhisattvas, such as those mentioned above, who appeared without distinction.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das @114a *//
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das @114a *//
translated: Then the Bhagavān

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po padma chags pa'i spyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te thugs ka'i dpal be'u la sogs pa'i gnas rnams nas 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed pa bkye bas /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po padma chags pa'i spyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te thugs ka'i dpal be'u la sogs pa'i gnas rnams nas 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed pa bkye bas /
translated: entered the samādhi called the lotus-passionate eye of the king of samādhis and emitted a maṇḍala of light rays from the places such as the glorious knot at his heart.

original: des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsal bar byas pa dang / ya mtshan gyi ltas chen po bco brgyad byung bar gyur to //
analyzed: des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsal bar byas pa dang / ya mtshan gyi ltas chen po bco brgyad byung bar gyur to //
translated: That illuminated all the worlds in the ten directions and caused the eighteen great wondrous signs to appear.

original: de nas snod dang bcud du bcas pa gsal zhing 'bar bar gyur nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs dam bskul te /
analyzed: de nas snod dang bcud du bcas pa gsal zhing 'bar bar gyur nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs dam bskul te /
translated: Then, after the world and its inhabitants became clear and blazing, the Bhagavān invoked the spiritual practice of the buddhas and bodhisattvas of the ten directions.

original: de dag gis kyang cho 'phrul rnam par 'khod pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen pos rang gis 'khor lo'i khyams dag tu spro bar byed mdzad do //
analyzed: de dag gis kyang cho 'phrul rnam par 'khod pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen pos rang gis 'khor lo'i khyams dag tu spro bar byed mdzad do //
translated: They also emanate the maṇḍala of the maṇḍala of the great seal called the Array of Miracles.

original: de yang zhing khams rnam par spyong zhing slar 'khor gyi 'khor dang bcas ba 'od zer 'phro ba'i gnas su 'dus so //
analyzed: de yang zhing khams rnam par spyong zhing slar 'khor gyi 'khor dang bcas ba 'od zer 'phro ba'i gnas su 'dus so //
translated: Having purified the buddhafields, they gather back into the place of the emanation of light rays together with the retinue of the retinue.

original: de ltar 'chad pa'i rgya chen bo'i rnam par rol 'phrul pas rol zhing zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas par gyur nas bzhugs pa las 'khor thams cad kyis the tshom skyes par gyur to //
analyzed: de ltar 'chad pa'i rgya chen bo'i rnam par rol 'phrul pas rol zhing zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas par gyur nas bzhugs pa las 'khor thams cad kyis the tshom skyes par gyur to //
translated: In that way, having displayed the great play of explanation, he remained with a smiling face, and all the retinues gave rise to doubt.

original: de'i dus na mthun par gleng ba ni /
analyzed: de'i dus na mthun par gleng ba ni /
translated: At that time, they spoke in harmony:🔽“Kye ma! The various amazing phenomena

original: kye ma ho ya mtshan sna tshogs chos; ;rgyal ba'i mdzad pa ya mtshan che //
analyzed: kye ma ho ya mtshan sna tshogs chos; ;rgyal ba'i mdzad pa ya mtshan che //
translated: are the amazing deeds of the jinas.

original: cho 'phrul dpag med gyur pa yi //
analyzed: cho 'phrul dpag med gyur pa yi //
translated: The miracles are immeasurable.

original: dgos pa'i don nyid ji lta bu //🔽rgyu rkyen med par sangs rgyas ni //
analyzed: dgos pa'i don nyid ji lta bu // rgyu rkyen med par sangs rgyas ni //
translated: What is the purpose of this?🔽The buddhas do not emanate

original: gsang gsum dam tshig @114b spro mi mdzad //
analyzed: gsang gsum dam tshig @114b spro mi mdzad //
translated: the three secrets without a cause and condition.

original: de yi mtshan nyid yang snang ba //
analyzed: de yi mtshan nyid yang snang ba //
translated: Its characteristic is also appearance.

original: gsang ba'i dbang po bskul bar mdzod //
analyzed: gsang ba'i dbang po bskul bar mdzod //
translated: You should arouse the secret lord.

original: khyod ni rgyal ba kun gyi sras //
analyzed: khyod ni rgyal ba kun gyi sras //
translated: You are the son of all the victors,

original: dgongs don rgya mtsho don mnga' ba //
analyzed: dgongs don rgya mtsho don mnga' ba //
translated: You possess the meaning of the ocean of the intended meaning.

original: bka' yi bdag po dgongs mdzod dag /
analyzed: bka' yi bdag po dgongs mdzod dag /
translated: You are the lord of the word; you should contemplate

original: legs par zhu zhing gsol gdab mdzod //
analyzed: legs par zhu zhing gsol gdab mdzod //
translated: and make excellent requests and supplications.

original: de nas gsang pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes lnga brgya dang bcas pas gzhan dag gi the tshom rnam par gcod pa dang / rang nyid kyi sgo gsal bar bya ba'i phyir mdun rol nas langs te phyogs bcu nas 'khod nas mchod pa'i tshogs rgya chen po bkod cing rgyal ba kun la mchod de lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bskor ba byas shing /
analyzed: de nas gsang pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes lnga brgya dang bcas pas gzhan dag gi the tshom rnam par gcod pa dang / rang nyid kyi sgo gsal bar bya ba'i phyir mdun rol nas langs te phyogs bcu nas 'khod nas mchod pa'i tshogs rgya chen po bkod cing rgyal ba kun la mchod de lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bskor ba byas shing /
translated: Then, Guhyapati Vajrapāṇi, together with the five hundred, in order to eliminate the doubts of others and to clarify his own door, arose in front and, having arranged a vast array of offerings to all the victors, circumambulated them one hundred and eight times.

original: rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag 'tshal nas dga' ba'i bzhin gyis gsol ba btab pa /🔽ae ma rgyal ba nyid kyi sku //
analyzed: rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag 'tshal nas dga' ba'i bzhin gyis gsol ba btab pa / ae ma rgyal ba nyid kyi sku //
translated: With one-pointed devotion, he prostrated and supplicated with a joyful face:🔽“Amazing! The body of the victors

original: rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor dag /
analyzed: rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor dag /
translated: is the maṇḍala of emanation.

original: ting 'dzin ye shes gnas las byung //
analyzed: ting 'dzin ye shes gnas las byung //
translated: Arisen from the abode of samādhi wisdom,🔽You delight in the gathering of the maṇḍala,

original: dga' mdzad dkyil 'khor 'dus pa dang // byang chub sems sprin char chen gyis //
analyzed: dga' mdzad dkyil 'khor 'dus pa dang // byang chub sems sprin char chen gyis //
translated: And with the great rain of the cloud of bodhicitta,

original: nyon mongs la sogs sbyong mdzad cing //
analyzed: nyon mongs la sogs sbyong mdzad cing //
translated: You purify the afflictions and so on.

original: thugs rje chen po ye shes kyis //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po ye shes kyis //
translated: With great compassion and wisdom,

original: tshogs pa'i 'bras bu legs smin mdzad //
analyzed: tshogs pa'i 'bras bu legs smin mdzad //
translated: You ripen the fruit of the accumulation.

original: sku mdangs dga' ba'i bzhin bcas pas //
analyzed: sku mdangs dga' ba'i bzhin bcas pas //
translated: With a face of delight and a radiant body,

original: gsang ba'i theg pa bstan du gsol //
analyzed: gsang ba'i theg pa bstan du gsol //
translated: Please teach the secret vehicle.

original: khyod kyi dgongs don gting dpag dka'//
analyzed: khyod kyi dgongs don gting dpag dka'//
translated: The meaning of your intention is difficult to fathom,

original: zab cing phra la rgya che bas //
analyzed: zab cing phra la rgya che bas //
translated: Profound, subtle, and vast.

original: 'khor rnams the tshom ri bos non //
analyzed: 'khor rnams the tshom ri bos non //
translated: The retinue is overcome by the mountain of doubt.

original: thugs rje che mnga' gsal bar mdzod //
analyzed: thugs rje che mnga' gsal bar mdzod //
translated: O one with great compassion, please clarify it.

original: 'di dag thams cad bstan @115a *//
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad bstan @115a *//
translated: All of these are vessels for the teachings.

original: pa'i snod // mgon po btang snyoms lhun mnga' mdzod //
analyzed: pa'i snod // mgon po btang snyoms lhun mnga' mdzod //
translated: O protector, please be spontaneously present with equanimity.

original: dus 'dir rtsom pa don che ste //
analyzed: dus 'dir rtsom pa don che ste //
translated: The composition at this time is of great meaning.

original: smon lam 'bras bu mthar phyin mdzod //
analyzed: smon lam 'bras bu mthar phyin mdzod //
translated: Please bring the result of aspiration to completion.

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i brtan g-yo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad thugs mnyam pa nyid rtse gcig gi sgo nas gzigs so //🔽rnam par gzigs /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i brtan g-yo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad thugs mnyam pa nyid rtse gcig gi sgo nas gzigs so // rnam par gzigs /
translated: Having made this request, the Bhagavān Vajradhara himself looked at the maṇḍala of the animate and inanimate universe of the three-thousandfold world systems through the door of one-pointed equipoise.🔽Vipaśyin,

original: kun tu gzigs /
analyzed: kun tu gzigs /
translated: Viśvabhū,

original: de ltar dgongs nas dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad smra bsam las 'das par sna tshogs rnam par smros shig /
analyzed: de ltar dgongs nas dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad smra bsam las 'das par sna tshogs rnam par smros shig /
translated: Having contemplated in that way, all of these maṇḍalas are beyond speech and thought.

original: de nyid dngos po dang bar gzigs nas gzigs pa'i mtha' dang / dgongs pa'i mtha' dang / mdzad pa'i mtha' kun la snyoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bkod pa dang / rnam par bkod pa dang / rnam par bshad ba dang /
analyzed: de nyid dngos po dang bar gzigs nas gzigs pa'i mtha' dang / dgongs pa'i mtha' dang / mdzad pa'i mtha' kun la snyoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bkod pa dang / rnam par bkod pa dang / rnam par bshad ba dang /
translated: Having seen that reality is empty, he entered equipoise on samādhi that is uniform with respect to the limits of seeing, the limits of contemplation, and the limits of deeds.🔽He did not delight in the various deeds of arrangement, complete arrangement, explanation,

original: dgongs pa dang / rnam par dgongs pa dang / rol pa dang / rol pa chen po dang / mdzad pa dang / sna tshogs mdzad pas kun tu spro bar mi byed de /
analyzed: dgongs pa dang / rnam par dgongs pa dang / rol pa dang / rol pa chen po dang / mdzad pa dang / sna tshogs mdzad pas kun tu spro bar mi byed de /
translated: contemplation, complete contemplation, play, great play, deeds, and various deeds.

original: 'jig rten drug gi rnam pas bsdus pa'i stong gsum gyi dngos po 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'di las gzhan du snang bar mi dgongs so //
analyzed: 'jig rten drug gi rnam pas bsdus pa'i stong gsum gyi dngos po 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'di las gzhan du snang bar mi dgongs so //
translated: He does not think that these things in the trichiliocosm, which are included in the six worlds, appear anywhere else than in this maṇḍala of the Buddha.

original: de'i dus dang / sa dang / sa'i khyad par dang / dkyil 'khor bkod pa dag kyang rnam par mi gzigs /
analyzed: de'i dus dang / sa dang / sa'i khyad par dang / dkyil 'khor bkod pa dag kyang rnam par mi gzigs /
translated: He does not see, does not fully see, the differences in time, place, and the arrangement of the maṇḍala.

original: kun tu mi gzigs shing dgongs pa yang @115b mi 'gog go /
analyzed: kun tu mi gzigs shing dgongs pa yang @115b mi 'gog go /
translated: He does not stop his intention.

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: They

original: mthar yang mi gnas shing nam mkha' lta bur bzhugs so //
analyzed: mthar yang mi gnas shing nam mkha' lta bur bzhugs so //
translated: do not remain in the end, but abide like space.

original: de nas ting nge 'dzin de la zhugs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bur rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas ting nge 'dzin de la zhugs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bur rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, as soon as he enters that samādhi, those maṇḍalas of the retinue also realize the nature of the maṇḍala of all phenomena to be like space.

original: de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi sgo nas bskul zhing gzhan dag gi don thugs g-yo bar mdzad pa'i glus g-yo slong bar mdzad de /
analyzed: de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi sgo nas bskul zhing gzhan dag gi don thugs g-yo bar mdzad pa'i glus g-yo slong bar mdzad de /
translated: Then, the lord of secrets, Vajrapāṇi, with a song of amazement, stirs up the stirring of the mind that moves for the benefit of others:

original: tshul phan don gyi rgyal po che //
analyzed: tshul phan don gyi rgyal po che //
translated: The great king of beneficial methods,

original: 'dren pa kun gyi rgyud nyid pas //
analyzed: 'dren pa kun gyi rgyud nyid pas //
translated: The continuum of all guides,

original: nam mkha' lta bu'i rgyud nyid pas //
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bu'i rgyud nyid pas //
translated: The continuum like space,

original: nam mkha' lta bu'i dkyil 'khor nas //
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bu'i dkyil 'khor nas //
translated: From the mandala like space,

original: thugs rje chen po'i ya mtshan ston //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po'i ya mtshan ston //
translated: Display the wonders of great compassion.

original: kye ma'o mgon po don kun nas //
analyzed: kye ma'o mgon po don kun nas //
translated: Ah! The protector who is the meaning of all,

original: zhi ba'i las dam 'jug byed pa //
analyzed: zhi ba'i las dam 'jug byed pa //
translated: Engaging in the sacred activity of peace,

original: byang sems thugs rje'i rlan bral lam //
analyzed: byang sems thugs rje'i rlan bral lam //
translated: The path devoid of the moisture of compassionate bodhicitta,

original: rdos can chos dang 'grang 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: rdos can chos dang 'grang 'gyur zhing //
translated: Will become attached to substantial phenomena.

original: zhes gsol ba btab pa las kyang ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
analyzed: zhes gsol ba btab pa las kyang ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
translated: Thus she made a request, but he remained silent.

original: de nas yang yum gzi ldan padmo zhes bya bas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin las slong ba'i glus skul bar mdzad de /
analyzed: de nas yang yum gzi ldan padmo zhes bya bas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin las slong ba'i glus skul bar mdzad de /
translated: Then again, the consort named Brilliant Lotus encouraged him with a song to rise from the nonconceptual samadhi:

original: mi dmigs ting 'dzin bsam 'das brjod dang bral //
analyzed: mi dmigs ting 'dzin bsam 'das brjod dang bral //
translated: The nonconceptual samadhi, beyond thought and expression,

original: bde ba chen po ye shes byang chub sems //
analyzed: bde ba chen po ye shes byang chub sems //
translated: The great bliss wisdom of bodhicitta,

original: mi dmigs thugs rje mi 'da' dam tshig gis //
analyzed: mi dmigs thugs rje mi 'da' dam tshig gis //
translated: By the commitment of nonconceptual compassion,

original: rol pa'i cho 'phrul rgya chen bstan du gsol //
analyzed: rol pa'i cho 'phrul rgya chen bstan du gsol //
translated: Please display the vast magical display.

original: de skad ces kyang bskul ba'i rjes //
analyzed: de skad ces kyang bskul ba'i rjes //
translated: Having been thus requested,

original: mgon po'i gnas rnams la dgongs @116a *//
analyzed: mgon po'i gnas rnams la dgongs @116a *//
translated: the Protector, having considered the places of protection,

original: nas; ;'od zer rnams bkod 'dzum mdzad de //
analyzed: nas; ;'od zer rnams bkod 'dzum mdzad de //
translated: arranged the light rays and smiled,

original: 'khor ba legs sbyin skabs dbye mdzad //
analyzed: 'khor ba legs sbyin skabs dbye mdzad //
translated: opening the opportunity for the gift of saṃsāra.

original: legs so legs so rdo rje can //
analyzed: legs so legs so rdo rje can //
translated: “Excellent, excellent, O Vajra Holder!

original: padmo 'dzin pa'i grogs bcas pas //
analyzed: padmo 'dzin pa'i grogs bcas pas //
translated: Together with the Lotus Holder,

original: yang yang bskul bar mdzad pas na //
analyzed: yang yang bskul bar mdzad pas na //
translated: you have urged me again and again,

original: gnang zhing bstan par mdzad pa la //
analyzed: gnang zhing bstan par mdzad pa la //
translated: so I grant permission and will teach.

original: dga' ba'i spyan rjes dang bar gyis //
analyzed: dga' ba'i spyan rjes dang bar gyis //
translated: With eyes of joy and with an impartial mind,

original: gang 'dod rtogs pa zhi bar mdzod //
analyzed: gang 'dod rtogs pa zhi bar mdzod //
translated: pacify the conceptualizations of what is desired.

original: ma 'ongs rtogs pa mtha' dag rnams //
analyzed: ma 'ongs rtogs pa mtha' dag rnams //
translated: All future conceptualizations

original: thugs rje shugs kyis bzung mdzad de //
analyzed: thugs rje shugs kyis bzung mdzad de //
translated: are held by the power of compassion,

original: don kun khyab pa'i snang ba yis //
analyzed: don kun khyab pa'i snang ba yis //
translated: and through the appearance that pervades all objects,

original: gzung bar bya ba'i skabs dbye mdzad /
analyzed: gzung bar bya ba'i skabs dbye mdzad /
translated: the opportunity to be held is opened.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba'i rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba'i rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las /
translated: From the Tantra of the Supreme Horse's Play, the Unsurpassed Secret of the Transcendent Wisdom of All Tathāgatas,

original: rnam par sprul pa'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
analyzed: rnam par sprul pa'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
translated: this is the first chapter on emanation.

original: de nas dga' zhing 'khor 'dus pas //
analyzed: de nas dga' zhing 'khor 'dus pas //
translated: Then, with a joyful and smiling face,

original: dga' ba'i bzhin bzang rgyas mdzad de //
analyzed: dga' ba'i bzhin bzang rgyas mdzad de //
translated: the assembly of retinue is delighted.

original: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal bzhin //
analyzed: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal bzhin //
translated: Just as the principal one has commanded,

original: thugs rjes 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gzungs //
analyzed: thugs rjes 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gzungs //
translated: the mandala of the arising of compassion is held.

original: de nas gzi ldan padmo can //
analyzed: de nas gzi ldan padmo can //
translated: Then, the one endowed with splendor and a lotus,

original: 'dzum mdangs rgyas pas bskul mdzad de //
analyzed: 'dzum mdangs rgyas pas bskul mdzad de //
translated: having been urged with a blooming smile,

original: 'o byed 'khyud pa la sogs pa //
analyzed: 'o byed 'khyud pa la sogs pa //
translated: with kissing, embracing, and so on,

original: dga' bzhin chags par rnam par 'gyur //
analyzed: dga' bzhin chags par rnam par 'gyur //
translated: is delighted and transformed with passion.

original: ae ma rig pa'i rgyal po khyod //
analyzed: ae ma rig pa'i rgyal po khyod //
translated: Ema! You, king of knowledge,

original: thugs rje chen po nyi 'od bzhin //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po nyi 'od bzhin //
translated: great compassion, like the sun's rays,

original: thugs rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gzungs //
analyzed: thugs rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gzungs //
translated: the mandala of the arising of compassion is held.

original: phyogs rig med pas go 'byed pas //
analyzed: phyogs rig med pas go 'byed pas //
translated: Since there is no awareness of directions, there is openness.

original: yul du gyur ba kun rgyud dgongs //
analyzed: yul du gyur ba kun rgyud dgongs //
translated: The mind is contemplated in all objects.

original: mi dmigs @116b cho 'phrul nam mkha' las //
analyzed: mi dmigs @116b cho 'phrul nam mkha' las //
translated: The non-apprehending magical display is in the sky,

original: bkod pa rgya mtsho sprin phung bzhin //
analyzed: bkod pa rgya mtsho sprin phung bzhin //
translated: like an array of clouds in the ocean.

original: thugs rje sprul pa'i char chen pos //
analyzed: thugs rje sprul pa'i char chen pos //
translated: With the great rain of compassion's emanations,

original: sna tshogs las brgyad dag par mdzod //
analyzed: sna tshogs las brgyad dag par mdzod //
translated: purify the various eight activities.

original: de nas gtso bo rdo rje 'chang //
analyzed: de nas gtso bo rdo rje 'chang //
translated: Then, the principal one, Vajradhara,🔽arises from samādhi,

original: ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs mdzad de //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs mdzad de //
translated: and with a smiling face,

original: rang gis mtshan mas rab mdzes pas //
analyzed: rang gis mtshan mas rab mdzes pas //
translated: Adorned with his own characteristics,

original: rgyal po zil gnon gzi brjid can //
analyzed: rgyal po zil gnon gzi brjid can //
translated: the king, overpowering and majestic,

original: phyag gi 'khor lo rab bskor cing //
analyzed: phyag gi 'khor lo rab bskor cing //
translated: turns the wheel of his hand

original: phyogs rnams kun tu gzigs mdzad de //
analyzed: phyogs rnams kun tu gzigs mdzad de //
translated: and looks in all directions.

original: mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings dag na //
analyzed: mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings dag na //
translated: In the space of the sky, free of reference points,

original: rdo rje sprul sku mngon phyung nas //
analyzed: rdo rje sprul sku mngon phyung nas //
translated: the vajra nirmāṇakāya manifests🔽and resides in the manner of play

original: gzi ldan padmo chen mo dang // rol pa'i tshul du bzhugs mdzad de //
analyzed: gzi ldan padmo chen mo dang // rol pa'i tshul du bzhugs mdzad de //
translated: in the great, majestic lotus.

original: 'dzum mig chags pa'i bzhin dag gis //
analyzed: 'dzum mig chags pa'i bzhin dag gis //
translated: With a face of longing and smiling eyes,

original: 'khor rnams slong ba'i sngags brjod do //
analyzed: 'khor rnams slong ba'i sngags brjod do //
translated: he utters the mantra of summoning the retinue:

original: aom a'a h'um mah'a bhasmi sha ku ru bi na hri da ya aam bha ba hi aa la la ho /
analyzed: aom a'a h'um mah'a bhasmi sha ku ru bi na hri da ya aam bha ba hi aa la la ho /
translated: oṃ āḥ hūṃ mahābhaṣmi kuru viṇi hṛdayaṃ bhavāhī ala la ho

original: gnyis su med pa'i byang sems kyis //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i byang sems kyis //
translated: With nondual bodhicitta,

original: dkyil 'khor sbyor zhing bsdu bar mdzod //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor sbyor zhing bsdu bar mdzod //
translated: join and gather the maṇḍala.

original: bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs sku //
analyzed: bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs sku //
translated: The kāya that completes the accumulations of merit and wisdom

original: rdo rje gar gyis rol mdzad cing //
analyzed: rdo rje gar gyis rol mdzad cing //
translated: plays with the dance of the vajra

original: dga' mchog rdo rje byang chub sems //
analyzed: dga' mchog rdo rje byang chub sems //
translated: and the supreme joy of vajra bodhicitta.🔽In the place of the swirling lotus,

original: 'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i padmo'i gnas //
analyzed: 'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i padmo'i gnas //
translated: smiling,

original: dkar 'tsher dag ba'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: dkar 'tsher dag ba'i rang bzhin te //
translated: The white is the nature of purity,

original: dmar po dbang dang gnyis med par //
analyzed: dmar po dbang dang gnyis med par //
translated: And the red is power and nonduality.

original: gsal khyab kun tu spros pa las //
analyzed: gsal khyab kun tu spros pa las //
translated: From the all-pervading, all-radiating

original: dkyil 'khor sprul pa mtha' yas thon //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor sprul pa mtha' yas thon //
translated: Emanate infinite maṇḍalas.🔽Peace, cessation, nirvāṇa,

original: zhi 'gog mya ngan 'das pa dang // byang chub mgon gnas lam zhes dag /
analyzed: zhi 'gog mya ngan 'das pa dang // byang chub mgon gnas lam zhes dag /
translated: Enlightenment, protection, abodes, and paths are said to be

original: gnyis med gnyis su sbyor mdzad cing //
analyzed: gnyis med gnyis su sbyor mdzad cing //
translated: Nondual, united in pairs,

original: rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la @117a *//🔽bkod; ;ngo mtshar sprul pa rnam par rol //
analyzed: rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la @117a *// bkod; ;ngo mtshar sprul pa rnam par rol //
translated: Arranged in one’s own maṇḍala abode.🔽The emanations of the amazing play

original: brjid dang bcas pas gar mdzad cing //
analyzed: brjid dang bcas pas gar mdzad cing //
translated: Are performed with majesty,🔽With smiles, with enjoyment,🔽With swaying, with beautiful eyes,🔽With swaying and moving long eyebrows,

original: 'dzum pa mdzad dang rol pa dang // kun tu 'gying dang spyan mdzes bltam; ;smin ring bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang // rdo rje phur bas g-ya' bas slong //
analyzed: 'dzum pa mdzad dang rol pa dang // kun tu 'gying dang spyan mdzes bltam; ;smin ring bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang // rdo rje phur bas g-ya' bas slong //
translated: With the itch of the vajra dagger.🔽With the dance of casting off,🔽With the dance of stretching,

original: 'dor zhing bskum dang 'jog ldeg dang // rnam par rol pa'i gar gyis kyang //
analyzed: 'dor zhing bskum dang 'jog ldeg dang // rnam par rol pa'i gar gyis kyang //
translated: With the dance of leaping,🔽With the dance of playing,

original: rigs kyi 'phrin las sna tshogs sprul //
analyzed: rigs kyi 'phrin las sna tshogs sprul //
translated: The various activities of the family are emanated.

original: nam mkha' kun tu khyab par mdzad //
analyzed: nam mkha' kun tu khyab par mdzad //
translated: They pervade the whole of space.

original: rnam par rol pa'i bde 'byung bar //
analyzed: rnam par rol pa'i bde 'byung bar //
translated: The arising of the bliss of play

original: byang chub sems sogs zhi zhing gsal //
analyzed: byang chub sems sogs zhi zhing gsal //
translated: The bodhicitta and so forth are peaceful and clear.

original: rol pa'i char nyid mngon 'bab pas //
analyzed: rol pa'i char nyid mngon 'bab pas //
translated: The rain of the display actually falls,

original: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na //🔽brtan dang g-yo ba ma lus pa'i //
analyzed: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na // brtan dang g-yo ba ma lus pa'i //
translated: In the ten directions of the six worlds,

original: sangs rgyas zhing khams dag byas nas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhing khams dag byas nas //
translated: Having purified all the buddhafields🔽Of the animate and inanimate,🔽The assembly of bodhisattvas plays.

original: byang chub sems tshogs rol pa las; ;brdeg dang 'khyud dang sdom pa las //
analyzed: byang chub sems tshogs rol pa las; ;brdeg dang 'khyud dang sdom pa las //
translated: From the play of bodhicitta,🔽From beating, embracing, and binding,

original: sbyor dang bstim dang mnyes pa dang // kun tu rab dgyes ye shes thig /
analyzed: sbyor dang bstim dang mnyes pa dang // kun tu rab dgyes ye shes thig /
translated: The wisdom-drop of union, absorption, satisfaction,🔽And complete joy arises.

original: sna tshogs snang ba nyi ma 'od //
analyzed: sna tshogs snang ba nyi ma 'od //
translated: The appearance of variety is the light of the sun.

original: yang dag bde la rab gnas mdzod //
analyzed: yang dag bde la rab gnas mdzod //
translated: Abide in the state of true bliss.

original: de 'dus pa'i tshe tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: de 'dus pa'i tshe tshogs pa'o //
translated: When they gather, they gather.

original: phyogs bcu kun nas bzhengs mdzad de //🔽thabs dang shes rab byin brlabs pa'i //
analyzed: phyogs bcu kun nas bzhengs mdzad de // thabs dang shes rab byin brlabs pa'i //
translated: Arising from all the ten directions,🔽The offering of the pure stream of bodhicitta,🔽Blessed by method and wisdom,

original: byang sems rnam dag rgyun gyis mchod; ;rnga dang sil snyan sgra sgrog shing //
analyzed: byang sems rnam dag rgyun gyis mchod; ;rnga dang sil snyan sgra sgrog shing //
translated: The sound of drums and cymbals resounds,🔽And the taste of the play of satisfying the senses,

original: dbang po tshim pa'i ro rtsed dang // gar dbyangs glu drug sna tshogs kun //
analyzed: dbang po tshim pa'i ro rtsed dang // gar dbyangs glu drug sna tshogs kun //
translated: The various dances, songs, and melodies

original: stong gsum gang bar gsung byas te //
analyzed: stong gsum gang bar gsung byas te //
translated: Fill the billion worlds.

original: bcom ldan @117b padmo bde yang bde //
analyzed: bcom ldan @117b padmo bde yang bde //
translated: The Blessed Lotus, blissful and also blissful,

original: gzi ldan yum dang bcas par mchod //
analyzed: gzi ldan yum dang bcas par mchod //
translated: is worshipped together with the radiant mother.

original: ae ma 'dus pa'i tshogs dbus na //
analyzed: ae ma 'dus pa'i tshogs dbus na //
translated: Amazing, in the midst of the assembled retinue,

original: thugs rje che mnga' nyi dkyil bzhin //
analyzed: thugs rje che mnga' nyi dkyil bzhin //
translated: the one with great compassion, like the sun's orb,🔽the universal monarch, the liberator,

original: 'khor lo kun sgyur sgrol mdzad pas; ;rang gi dkyil 'khor rgyas par mdzad //
analyzed: 'khor lo kun sgyur sgrol mdzad pas; ;rang gi dkyil 'khor rgyas par mdzad //
translated: enlarges his own mandala.

original: rdo rje 'chang ba'i gsol 'debs kyis //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ba'i gsol 'debs kyis //
translated: Through the supplication of the vajra holder,

original: dkyil 'khor dag la lhun grub rdzogs //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dag la lhun grub rdzogs //
translated: in the mandalas, spontaneous presence is perfected.

original: padma'i dpal ldan sems pa che //
analyzed: padma'i dpal ldan sems pa che //
translated: The glorious lotus, the great mind,

original: 'phrin las ye shes gnas kun spyod //
analyzed: 'phrin las ye shes gnas kun spyod //
translated: acts in all abodes of activity and wisdom.

original: khyod zhabs bskyed pa thugs rje'i stobs //
analyzed: khyod zhabs bskyed pa thugs rje'i stobs //
translated: Your feet are generated by the power of compassion.

original: khams gsum ma lus dag pa yi //
analyzed: khams gsum ma lus dag pa yi //
translated: The entire three realms are pure.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mchog /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mchog /
translated: The supreme wisdom of suchness

original: mgon po bka' drin mdzad pas legs //
analyzed: mgon po bka' drin mdzad pas legs //
translated: is well-done by the kind protector.

original: de skad gsol btab dgyes par 'gyur //
analyzed: de skad gsol btab dgyes par 'gyur //
translated: With this supplication, he becomes pleased.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i gnas la bzhugs //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i gnas la bzhugs //
translated: He abides in the abode of the great seal.

original: de nas dga' ba'i byang chub sems //
analyzed: de nas dga' ba'i byang chub sems //
translated: Then, the bodhicitta of joy

original: sngon gyi rgyud dang lam bzhi las //
analyzed: sngon gyi rgyud dang lam bzhi las //
translated: arises from the four paths of the previous tantra.

original: sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang // sngon gyi rgyud dang lam grogs rnams //
analyzed: sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang // sngon gyi rgyud dang lam grogs rnams //
translated: the previous tantras, and the companions on the path,

original: dgongs shing thugs rje'i ye shes thugs //
analyzed: dgongs shing thugs rje'i ye shes thugs //
translated: think and have the wisdom mind of compassion.

original: rang bzhin gnas nas kun dgongs te //
analyzed: rang bzhin gnas nas kun dgongs te //
translated: Thinking of all from the natural abode,

original: rdo rje rgyal po byang chub sems //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyal po byang chub sems //

analyzed: bdag dgongs 'gro ba'i don chen mdzad //

analyzed: kye kye yon tan rin chen tshogs //

analyzed: thugs rje mnyam nyid ye shes che //

analyzed: rgyal po 'khor lo byang chub nyid //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor sna tshogs sprul pa'i mdzod // kye kye rnam par @118a *//

original: dag pa'i sku //
analyzed: dag pa'i sku //

analyzed: dga' ba'i rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i gnas //

analyzed: so so'i ye shes sna tshogs 'byed //

analyzed: chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid //

original: kye kye 'gro ba'i don chen bdag /
analyzed: kye kye 'gro ba'i don chen bdag /

analyzed: btang snyoms mi 'dor sna tshogs dor //

original: bya ba grub pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /
analyzed: bya ba grub pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /

analyzed: phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag ston //

analyzed: rang dga'i bskum pas g-yo mdzad de; ;phyogs bzhi byang chub dga' nas 'jug /

analyzed: nyon mongs gzung 'dzin sgrib pa yis //

analyzed: 'di dag thugs rje'i gnas su rung //

analyzed: ye shes gsal ba'i thabs mang pos //

analyzed: thams cad dus gcig bsgral byas nas //

original: rang gi bde chen don ston mchog /
analyzed: rang gi bde chen don ston mchog /

analyzed: zhes gsungs padma'i rig pa 'dzin //

analyzed: thugs rje sprul pa'i rol pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////

analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gtso //

analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ba stan las langs //

original: bde gshegs bsngags brjod byed cing //
analyzed: bde gshegs bsngags brjod byed cing //

analyzed: bskum pas dbyangs kyis gsol ba btab //

analyzed: kye ma ho mchog gsum dam tshig sku //

original: ye shes bla na med @118b pa'i bdag /
analyzed: ye shes bla na med @118b pa'i bdag /

original: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid //

analyzed: rnam 'phrul thugs rje'i dus nyid pas //

original: rigs kyi 'khor lo dpag med sku //
analyzed: rigs kyi 'khor lo dpag med sku //

original: de ring bkra shis phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: de ring bkra shis phun sum tshogs //

original: thugs rje chen po yal 'dor na //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po yal 'dor na //

analyzed: ci phyir theg chen mchog tu bsngags //

analyzed: yang dag zhus pa'i tshig gsan nas //

original: mgon po'i padma'i sku de nyid //
analyzed: mgon po'i padma'i sku de nyid //

analyzed: gzi ldan yum dang rol mdzad cing //

analyzed: dri med ye shes phyogs gzigs shing //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 'jug ste //

analyzed: sku las 'od zer spro bar mjad //

analyzed: @119a *// rin chen sna tshogs na bza' dang // phyag rgya'i yum bcas rol pa mdzad //

analyzed: dra ba dra phyed mu tig phreng //

original: padmo rdo rje sogs pas spras //
analyzed: padmo rdo rje sogs pas spras //

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs //

original: padma 'khor lo nyi zlas mtshan //
analyzed: padma 'khor lo nyi zlas mtshan //

analyzed: phyi rol bar khyams 'khor ba dang // snod rnams kun tu padma la; ;thabs dang shes rab bye brag gis //

analyzed: nyi ma zla ba rkyang pa'o //

original: de nas padma rnam dag kun //
analyzed: de nas padma rnam dag kun //

analyzed: dbus kyi gdan la bzhugs mdzad de //

analyzed: de tshe thugs mchog byang chub sems //

analyzed: mkha' klong rnam par dag pas na //

analyzed: rig pa bde ba chen po'i sku //

original: sna tshogs sna tshogs shar ba de //
analyzed: sna tshogs sna tshogs shar ba de //

analyzed: gsung nyid yi ge 'khor lo'i tshogs //

analyzed: 'bar ba 'od zer rtse lnga pa //

analyzed: thugs kyi mtshan ma dam tshig bya; ;sngags bcas 'phro zhing 'du ba'i tshul //

analyzed: rigs kyi rgyal phreng mtshan mas mjes //

original: rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs shing //
analyzed: rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs shing //

analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod //

analyzed: de tshe mgon po bde chen po //

analyzed: rigs kun bdag 'gyur zhes bya bas // padmo rnam par 'phrul pa yi //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po 'byin par mdzad //

analyzed: byang sems kam las rnam 'phrul pa'i /

analyzed: bde shes 'od zer snang ba'i sku //

analyzed: zhal dang phyag la sogs pa'i rgyan //
translated: adorned with faces, hands, and so on,

analyzed: gtso bo'i cha lugs ji ltar bar //

analyzed: bkra shis mtshan ldan bde ba la; ;r'a ga padmo h'um zhes pas //

analyzed: sngags mchog yi ge 'bru brgyad de //
translated: is the supreme mantra of eight syllables,

analyzed: las kun grub par mdzad pa yin //

analyzed: zhi rgyas dbang drag las kun dang // grub chen brgyad kyi tshogs gsog rnams //

analyzed: sbyor ba tsam gyis grub 'gyur zhing //

analyzed: yun ring gnas pa gnas pa gnas pa yin //

analyzed: 'byin pa'i dus su gsang sngags la; ;yi ge ja yis gdags byas nas //

original: thugs rje skal ba'i glu dang sngags //
analyzed: thugs rje skal ba'i glu dang sngags //

analyzed: aom/ rnam dag padmo bde ba'i dbyings // ye shes byin @120a *//

analyzed: las gsal ba'i mchog /

analyzed: dkyil 'khor gsang gsum dam tshig che //

original: mnyam nyid rigs bdag thub pa che //

analyzed: byin rlabs 'dor bar mi mdzad pas; ;sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs //

analyzed: bcu drug 'od zer 'phro byas pas //

analyzed: rang gi gnas su bkod byas pas //

analyzed: sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rim bzhin gsal //

original: brnyan pa'i yi ge drug dang bcas //
analyzed: brnyan pa'i yi ge drug dang bcas //

translated: He is surrounded by a complete assembly of wrathful ornaments, like lotus petals.🔽From ka comes Kṣemamati,🔽blue-black, with one face and four arms.

original: ka las bde ba'i blo gros dang // zhal gcig phyag bzhi nam mkha'i mdangs //
analyzed: ka las bde ba'i blo gros dang // zhal gcig phyag bzhi nam mkha'i mdangs //
translated: He holds a vajra and a bell with his mother, and a wheel with a garland of fire.🔽From kha comes Khagamukha,🔽blue-black, with one face and four arms.🔽He holds a jewel, a lute, a garland, and a fly whisk with a vajra crown.🔽From ga comes Tejorāśi,🔽blue-black, with one face and four arms.

original: yum bcas rdo rje dril bu dang // nam mkha'i mdzod kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang // kha las khang pa rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs can //
analyzed: yum bcas rdo rje dril bu dang // nam mkha'i mdzod kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang // kha las khang pa rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs can //
translated: He holds a jewel, a lute, a garland, and a fly whisk with a vajra crown.🔽From ṅa comes Ṛddhivajra,

original: zhal gcig phyag bzhi pu sha ra //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag bzhi pu sha ra //
translated: blue-black, with one face and four arms.🔽He holds a jewel, a lute, a garland, and a fly whisk with a vajra crown.🔽From ṭa comes Ṭakkirāja,🔽blue-black, with one face and four arms.

original: rin chen pi wang phreng ba dang // rnga yab rdo rje cod pan thogs //
analyzed: rin chen pi wang phreng ba dang // rnga yab rdo rje cod pan thogs //
translated: He holds a jewel, a lute, a garland, and a fly whisk with a vajra crown.🔽From ḍa comes Ḍākinī,🔽blue-black, with one face and four arms.🔽She holds a flaying knife, a skull, a khaṭvāṅga, and a khatvāṅga.🔽From ṭa comes Caṇḍālī,🔽blue-black, with one face and four arms.🔽She holds a flaying knife, a skull, a khaṭvāṅga, and a khatvāṅga.

original: ga las gzi brjid bkod pa ni //
analyzed: ga las gzi brjid bkod pa ni //
translated: From ḍa comes Ghasmarī,🔽blue-black, with one face and four arms.🔽She holds a flaying knife, a skull, a khaṭvāṅga, and a khatvāṅga.🔽From ṇa comes Pukkasī,🔽blue-black, with one face and four arms.

original: zhal gcig phyag bzhi rgya skegs mdog /
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag bzhi rgya skegs mdog /
translated: One face, four arms, the color of vermillion,🔽holding a lotus sprout, a moon,🔽a wheel, and a wish-fulfilling gem.

original: padma'i lcug ma zla ba dang // 'khor lo yid bzhin bum pa dang // gha las sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnon pa ni //🔽zhal gcig phyag bzhi mar dang // 'khor lo dbyug pa ma mo shing //
analyzed: padma'i lcug ma zla ba dang // 'khor lo yid bzhin bum pa dang // gha las sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnon pa ni // zhal gcig phyag bzhi mar dang // 'khor lo dbyug pa ma mo shing //

original: rgya gram rin chen lcug ma 'dzin //
analyzed: rgya gram rin chen lcug ma 'dzin //

analyzed: tsa las shes rab snang ba ni //

analyzed: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang skya'i mdangs //

analyzed: @124a *// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar dang ser //

analyzed: dmar ljang padmo me long dang // rin chen phreng ba pi wang gar //

analyzed: sha sha sa ha las 'phrul pa'i //

analyzed: padmo tshim byed la sogs pa'i //

original: bdug spos me tog dung dang dri //
analyzed: bdug spos me tog dung dang dri //

analyzed: 'gying tshul tri sh'ul las kyi tshul //

analyzed: mchod pas phyi yi mtshams na gnas //

analyzed: de dag gi gsang sngags ni / aom dhe hi r'a ga padma shi ri pu ta h'um h'um sv'ah'a /
translated: Their secret mantras are:🔽Oṃ dehirāgapadmaśirīputa hūṃ hūṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ padma mahādharparapuṇasita mahādhṛdaya hūṃ hūṃ.

original: aom padma ma h'a dha ba ra bu na si ta mah'a dha ma hri da y'a h'um h'um/
analyzed: aom padma ma h'a dha ba ra bu na si ta mah'a dha ma hri da y'a h'um h'um/
translated: Bhrāṃ jaya svāhā.

original: brad tang ya dza sv'ah'a; dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o //
analyzed: brad tang ya dza sv'ah'a; dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o //
translated: In the center of the maṇḍala.

original: aom tsakra aa lo ka na ma raksha sam bha ratna hri ti ba ya ba ti dza sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom tsakra aa lo ka na ma raksha sam bha ratna hri ti ba ya ba ti dza sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ cakra-āloka-nama-rakṣa-saṃbhara-ratna-hrīta-vāya-pati-jaḥ svāhā.

original: nub phyogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: nub phyogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: This is the maṇḍala of the west.

original: aom badzra da ra ba kri ta ya ni sham ra ti pa sham ni dza sv'ah'a; shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la'o //
analyzed: aom badzra da ra ba kri ta ya ni sham ra ti pa sham ni dza sv'ah'a; shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la'o //
translated: Oṃ vajra-dārava-kṛta-ya-ni-śaṃ-rati-paśaṃ-ni-jaḥ svāhā. This is for the maṇḍala of the east.

original: aom ratna ku ti du manta bandha bandha du na du na bi dza sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom ratna ku ti du manta bandha bandha du na du na bi dza sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ ratna-kuṭi-dumanta-bandha-bandha-dunā dunā-vijaḥ svāhā.

original: lho phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor pa'o //
analyzed: lho phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor pa'o //
translated: This is for the maṇḍala of the south.

original: aom bi sha tsi na dha ma ma du ru ha ha ha ha sarba gurba ni h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom bi sha tsi na dha ma ma du ru ha ha ha ha sarba gurba ni h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ viśa-cinadhā-ma-dumuru-ha ha ha ha sarva-gurvaṇi hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: byang gi dkyil 'khor pa'o //
analyzed: byang gi dkyil 'khor pa'o //
translated: This is for the maṇḍala of the north.

original: aom mam ma aa ba le ka na ru ru yu ru si de bhyo de satva ma ma h'um dza sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom mam ma aa ba le ka na ru ru yu ru si de bhyo de satva ma ma h'um dza sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ mamāvaleka-narururuyururisi-bhyo de-stvā-mama hūṃ jaḥ svāhā.

original: rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o //
translated: This is for the bodhisattvas of the buddha family.

original: aom bi lo ka n'a ma si tan ma ku ru ku ru bo dhi satva bha ra bu na dza h'um dza sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom bi lo ka n'a ma si tan ma ku ru ku ru bo dhi satva bha ra bu na dza h'um dza sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ vilokanā-masī-tan-makuru-kurubodhisattva-bhara-bunajaḥ hūṃ jaḥ svāhā.

original: rigs las sprul pa'i byang chub sems kyi'o //
analyzed: rigs las sprul pa'i byang chub sems kyi'o //
translated: This is for the bodhisattvas emanated from the buddha family.

original: aom bindha bindha sarba karma si de de bi ku ru bu ta sam bo ha h'um aom aam dza sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom bindha bindha sarba karma si de de bi ku ru bu ta sam bo ha h'um aom aam dza sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ bindha bindha sarva karma siddhi deva vikurva bodhana svāhā.🔽This is for the goddesses.

original: lha mo rnams @124b kyi'o; ;aom aa pasma ra kro dha sni /
analyzed: lha mo rnams @124b kyi'o; ;aom aa pasma ra kro dha sni /

original: yaksha h'um h'um h'um bi tam pa ka phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: yaksha h'um h'um h'um bi tam pa ka phat sv'ah'a /

original: khro bo rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: khro bo rnams kyi'o //

original: gsang sngags rgyal po mi zad pas //
analyzed: gsang sngags rgyal po mi zad pas //
translated: The king of mantras is inexhaustible.

original: rnam par sprul pa sku yis ni //
analyzed: rnam par sprul pa sku yis ni //

original: stong gsum gnas nas g-yo mdzad de //
analyzed: stong gsum gnas nas g-yo mdzad de //
translated: he moves from the realm of the trichiliocosm

original: rang gi lha la gsal bar mdzod //
analyzed: rang gi lha la gsal bar mdzod //

original: de nas mgon po rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: de nas mgon po rdo rje 'dzin //

analyzed: bde chen gar gyi dbang phyug gis // dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gsal byed pa'i //

original: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas //
translated: having entered into equipoise in samādhi🔽that illuminates the three maṇḍalas,

analyzed: dkyil 'khor byin brlabs dbang bskur zhing //

original: rigs kyi bdag pos gsal bar mdzod //
analyzed: rigs kyi bdag pos gsal bar mdzod //

original: gnas kun mtshan ma yongs dag nas //
analyzed: gnas kun mtshan ma yongs dag nas //

original: rnam gsum snang ba gnyis med 'gyur; ;aom na ma sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'a ka tsitta mah'a bo dhi hya su tram tri sha shu dhe so na khya h'um h'um h'um/
analyzed: rnam gsum snang ba gnyis med 'gyur; ;aom na ma sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'a ka tsitta mah'a bo dhi hya su tram tri sha shu dhe so na khya h'um h'um h'um/
translated: Oṃ namo sarva tathāgata kāya vāka citta mahā bodhi hya sutraṃ tri śa śuddhe so na khyā hūṃ hūṃ hūṃ.

original: aom rin chen dbu rgyan gyi sngags so //
analyzed: aom rin chen dbu rgyan gyi sngags so //
translated: Oṃ is the mantra of the jeweled crown.

original: sarba bu ta ku ru ratna ma ma ku ta /
analyzed: sarba bu ta ku ru ratna ma ma ku ta /
translated: Sarva buddha kuru ratna mamākuta.

original: aa aa b'irya sad ma ma ku aa bhi shinytsa aom a'a:h'um sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aa aa b'irya sad ma ma ku aa bhi shinytsa aom a'a:h'um sv'ah'a /
translated: A ā vaiśya sadma mamākuta abhiṣiñca oṃ āḥ hūṃ svāhā.

original: aom padma aa mo ka sa ma ya shr'i ha ha ha tshindha ma ni aa smi sha bi ma ma ya h'um h'um/
analyzed: aom padma aa mo ka sa ma ya shr'i ha ha ha tshindha ma ni aa smi sha bi ma ma ya h'um h'um/
translated: Oṃ padma amogha samaya śrī ha ha ha tsin dha mani asmi śava vimala maya hūṃ hūṃ.

original: sngags gsum gyis gsal bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: sngags gsum gyis gsal bar byed pa'o //
translated: The three mantras clarify.

original: aom bi sha tsa ni dha ma ni aa ba sam bo da ma ma ku ru si la la ta si na bi bud pa pam da h'um h'um h'um/
analyzed: aom bi sha tsa ni dha ma ni aa ba sam bo da ma ma ku ru si la la ta si na bi bud pa pam da h'um h'um h'um/
translated: Oṃ viśa cani dhama ni ava sambodha mamāku ru silalata sinā vibudha pāpaṃ dhuṃ hūṃ hūṃ.

original: rnam par spro ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: rnam par spro ba'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra of full manifestation.

original: aom ma ta la ni bi sha tsakra ku ma ta bu ta na ma sil du tri si h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom ma ta la ni bi sha tsakra ku ma ta bu ta na ma sil du tri si h'um phat sv'ah'a /
translated: Oṃ matala ni viśa cakra kumata butana masil du tri si hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i sngags so; ;aom aam aa aa min du she ma la sha na du na dhe ta th'a ga te bhyod ti padma ku ru a'a:h'um sv'ah'a /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i sngags so; ;aom aam aa aa min du she ma la sha na du na dhe ta th'a ga te bhyod ti padma ku ru a'a:h'um sv'ah'a /
translated: The mantra for the clear maṇḍala:🔽Oṃ aṃ āṃ aḥ🔽Amṛta udakaṃ dehi tathāgate bhyaḥ oṃ padma kuru āḥ hūṃ svāhā.🔽

original: rbad pa'i sngags so //🔽aom padma mu kham padma ba ba sa bo ti di ra yam gu ru h'um h'um h'um ham ham darsha sv'ah'a /
analyzed: rbad pa'i sngags so // aom padma mu kham padma ba ba sa bo ti di ra yam gu ru h'um h'um h'um ham ham darsha sv'ah'a /
translated: The mantra for the clear maṇḍala:

original: snying po'i @125a *//🔽sngags so // aom na ma su tram bho ga ga na gu ma le sam s'a ra h'um phat sv'ah'a /
analyzed: snying po'i @125a *// sngags so // aom na ma su tram bho ga ga na gu ma le sam s'a ra h'um phat sv'ah'a /

original: rig pa mchog gi sngags so //🔽aom ba ga ga pa sam po padma dha ae hye hi mah'a k'a ru ma da aa ma dhu na dza dza; spyan drang ba'i sngags so //

original: aom padmo sam ga ga su ra ta ra ga sa ma ye stvam/
analyzed: aom padmo sam ga ga su ra ta ra ga sa ma ye stvam/

analyzed: gdan gyi sngags so //

analyzed: thabs mkhas pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs //

original: sa dang sa 'das don chen po //
analyzed: sa dang sa 'das don chen po //

original: la la sku dang gsung dang thugs //
analyzed: la la sku dang gsung dang thugs //

analyzed: ya mtshan chos la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: rnam 'phrul sku la phyag 'tshal lo //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
translated: Chapter III: The Emanation of the Mandala.

original: de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams //
analyzed: de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams //

original: dga' ba chen po ngo mtshar gyis //
analyzed: dga' ba chen po ngo mtshar gyis //

original: rgyud gsum rnam dag tshim gyur nas //
analyzed: rgyud gsum rnam dag tshim gyur nas //

original: dgyes pa'i dbyangs kyis gsol ba btab //
analyzed: dgyes pa'i dbyangs kyis gsol ba btab //

original: ae ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan che //
analyzed: ae ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan che //

original: gnyis med rol pa ya mtshan che //🔽dri med dang ba ya mtshan che //
analyzed: gnyis med rol pa ya mtshan che // dri med dang ba ya mtshan che //

original: 'od 'phro 'du ba ya mtshan che //
analyzed: 'od 'phro 'du ba ya mtshan che //
translated: The radiating and gathering of light is wondrous!

original: byang chub sprin phung ya mtshan che //🔽sangs rgyas 'byung ba ya mtshan che //
analyzed: byang chub sprin phung ya mtshan che // sangs rgyas 'byung ba ya mtshan che //
translated: The cloud bank of enlightenment is wondrous!🔽The arising of the buddhas is wondrous!

original: 'phrul pa 'byung ba ya mtshan che //
analyzed: 'phrul pa 'byung ba ya mtshan che //

original: khro bo 'byung ba ya mtshan che //🔽byin rlabs cho 'phrul ya mtshan che //
analyzed: khro bo 'byung ba ya mtshan che // byin rlabs cho 'phrul ya mtshan che //

original: tha ba rlan mdzad ya mtshan che //
analyzed: tha ba rlan mdzad ya mtshan che //
translated: The moistening of the dry is wondrous!

original: 'gog pa rlung mdzad ya mtshan che //
analyzed: 'gog pa rlung mdzad ya mtshan che //

analyzed: bdag cag 'khor tshogs 'dus pa rnams // dam tshig can du byin brlabs mdzad //

original: za 'og rim pa ji bzhin du //
analyzed: za 'og rim pa ji bzhin du //
translated: Just like the layers of brocade,

original: rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'god //
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'god //
translated: We are placed in the ranks of the vajra secret.

original: de nas @126a *//
analyzed: de nas @126a *//

original: bcom ldan bde chen pos //
analyzed: bcom ldan bde chen pos //

analyzed: chags pa chen po rdo rje'i sku //

original: sku dang gsung thugs gnyis med pa'i //
analyzed: sku dang gsung thugs gnyis med pa'i //

original: rang gi dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzod //
analyzed: rang gi dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzod //

original: de tshe byang chub sems chen po //
analyzed: de tshe byang chub sems chen po //

analyzed: 'od zer kun tu khyab pa des //

analyzed: rang gi ye shes dbang thob ste //

analyzed: las la spyod pa'i gnas rnams dang // rang skyob pa yi sems dag gis //

analyzed: sku gsum gsal ba rnam par snang //

analyzed: dngos po thams cad bral ba yi //

analyzed: phung khams skye mched rnam par dben //

original: gzung 'jin rtog pa'i yul bral bas //
analyzed: gzung 'jin rtog pa'i yul bral bas //

analyzed: dpag med pa yi ngo bo nyid //

original: rnam gsum mchog gi don las byung //
analyzed: rnam gsum mchog gi don las byung //

analyzed: 'od gsal chen po'i rang bzhin no //

original: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i don //
analyzed: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i don //

analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs //

original: skye dang skye med sna tshogs dngos //
analyzed: skye dang skye med sna tshogs dngos //

original: de dag chos las rnam grol ba'o //
analyzed: de dag chos las rnam grol ba'o //

analyzed: bden pa chen po'i ting 'dzin rgya //

analyzed: ngo mtshar ya mtshan rmad kyi chos //

analyzed: me long gsal ba'i rang bzhin can //

analyzed: rgyal ba rnams kyi gsang ba'i mdzod //

analyzed: @129b gnas dang gnas med byang chub sems //

analyzed: dmigs dang mi dmigs sna tshogs ni //

analyzed: byang sems de nyid bstod par bya //

original: rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med //
analyzed: rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med //
translated: is pure by nature and stainless.

original: phung po chos rnams sangs rgyas te //
analyzed: phung po chos rnams sangs rgyas te //
translated: The aggregates are the buddhas,

original: 'byung lnga dbyings phyug yum gyi mkha'//
analyzed: 'byung lnga dbyings phyug yum gyi mkha'//
translated: and the five elements are the space of the mother.

original: khams dang skye mched sems dpa' dang // sems ma'i tshogs dang khro bo'i sku //🔽phyi nang srid gsum dngos snang ba'i //
analyzed: khams dang skye mched sems dpa' dang // sems ma'i tshogs dang khro bo'i sku // phyi nang srid gsum dngos snang ba'i //
translated: The elements and sense bases are the assembly of heroes and heroines and the wrathful forms.

original: dkyil 'khor rigs kyi bdag nyid che //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rigs kyi bdag nyid che //
translated: The maṇḍala is the great lord of the family of the apparent entities of the three existences, outer and inner.

original: gzugs phung rnam par snang mdzad che //
analyzed: gzugs phung rnam par snang mdzad che //
translated: The aggregate of matter is the great Vairocana.

original: tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan sku //🔽'du shes snang ba mtha' yas sku //
analyzed: tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan sku // 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas sku //
translated: Sensation is the form of Ratnasambhava.🔽Perception is the form of Amitābha.

original: 'du byed don yod grub pa yin //
analyzed: 'du byed don yod grub pa yin //
translated: Formation is Amoghasiddhi.

original: rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste //
analyzed: rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste //
translated: Consciousness is Vajrasattva.

original: thams cad bder gshegs lnga yi sku //
analyzed: thams cad bder gshegs lnga yi sku //
translated: All are the kāyas of the five sugatas.

original: sa khams sangs rgyas spyan yin te //
analyzed: sa khams sangs rgyas spyan yin te //
translated: The earth element is Buddhalocanā.

original: chu khams lha mo m'a ma k'i //
analyzed: chu khams lha mo m'a ma k'i //
translated: The water element is the goddess Māmakī.

original: me khams na bza' dkar mo ste //
analyzed: me khams na bza' dkar mo ste //
translated: The fire element is Pāṇḍaravāsinī,

original: @131b rlung khams dam tshig sgrol ma 'o //
analyzed: @131b rlung khams dam tshig sgrol ma 'o //
translated: and the wind element is Samayatārā.

original: nam mkha' kun du bzang mo'i sku //
analyzed: nam mkha' kun du bzang mo'i sku //
translated: Space is the body of Samantabhadrī.

original: 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa'o //
translated: This is the pure maṇḍala of the elements.

original: dbang po'i spyod yul ma lus kun //
analyzed: dbang po'i spyod yul ma lus kun //
translated: All objects of the senses without exception

original: thams cad bder gshegs rigs kyi sku //
analyzed: thams cad bder gshegs rigs kyi sku //
translated: are the bodies of the sugata families.

original: mig la rnam par snang mdzad de //
analyzed: mig la rnam par snang mdzad de //
translated: Vairocana is in the eyes,

original: rna ba rin chen 'byung ldan che //🔽sna la snang ba mtha' yas nyid //
analyzed: rna ba rin chen 'byung ldan che // sna la snang ba mtha' yas nyid //
translated: and Mahāratnasambhava is in the ears.🔽Amitābha is in the nose,

original: lce la don yod grub pa'i sku //
analyzed: lce la don yod grub pa'i sku //
translated: and Amoghasiddhi is in the tongue.

original: lus nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin //
analyzed: lus nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin //
translated: The body itself is Vajrasattva.

original: de ltar snang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
analyzed: de ltar snang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
translated: Thus, the maṇḍala of appearances🔽is the meaning of the secret yoga.

original: ye nas lhun grub gnas pas na //
analyzed: ye nas lhun grub gnas pas na //
translated: Since it has always been naturally perfected,

original: rnal 'byor gsang ba don shes bya //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gsang ba don shes bya //
translated: it is called the “secret meaning of yoga.”

original: phyi rol don shes yul drug 'di //
analyzed: phyi rol don shes yul drug 'di //
translated: The six objects of the consciousness of external objects

original: yum chen lnga yi phyag rgya'i dbyibs //
analyzed: yum chen lnga yi phyag rgya'i dbyibs //
translated: are the shapes of the mudras of the five great mothers.

original: gzugs khams sangs rgyas spyan ma ste //
analyzed: gzugs khams sangs rgyas spyan ma ste //
translated: The form element is Buddhalocanā,

original: sgra tshogs lha mo m'a mak'i //
analyzed: sgra tshogs lha mo m'a mak'i //
translated: the sound element is Māmakī,

original: dri tshogs na bza' dkar mo'i dbyings //
analyzed: dri tshogs na bza' dkar mo'i dbyings //
translated: and the smell element is Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: ro drug lha mo sgrol ma yin //
analyzed: ro drug lha mo sgrol ma yin //
translated: The six tastes are the goddess Tārā.

original: reg tshogs lha mo kun du bzang mo'i sku //
analyzed: reg tshogs lha mo kun du bzang mo'i sku //
translated: The aggregate of touch is the form of the goddess Samantabhadrī.

original: dus gsum mnyam sbyor 'du 'bral med //
analyzed: dus gsum mnyam sbyor 'du 'bral med //
translated: The union of the three times is inseparable.

original: rdo rje padmo mnyam sbyor bas //
analyzed: rdo rje padmo mnyam sbyor bas //
translated: The union of the vajra and lotus

original: rang rig dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzod //
analyzed: rang rig dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzod //
translated: is the clear maṇḍala of one’s awareness.

original: thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs //
analyzed: thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs //
translated: All without exception are the body, speech, mind,

original: yon tan 'phrin las rol pa'i rgyan //
analyzed: yon tan 'phrin las rol pa'i rgyan //
translated: qualities, and activities of the display.

original: nga nyid 'du 'bral med pa'i dbyings //
analyzed: nga nyid 'du 'bral med pa'i dbyings //
translated: I am the inseparable dhātu,

original: thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i mchog /
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i mchog /
translated: the supreme play of method and wisdom.

original: sa yi khyad par ma lus pa'ang //
analyzed: sa yi khyad par ma lus pa'ang //
translated: All the stages of the bhūmis🔽are united by Vajradharma,🔽and because of the perfection of qualities and activities,

original: rdo rje chos kyis sbyor mdzad dang // yon tan 'phrin las mtha' phyin pas; ;tshe 'di nyid kyi go 'phang mchog /
analyzed: rdo rje chos kyis sbyor mdzad dang // yon tan 'phrin las mtha' phyin pas; ;tshe 'di nyid kyi go 'phang mchog /
translated: the supreme stage of this very life.

original: rdo rje gsang gsum dam tshig che //
analyzed: rdo rje gsang gsum dam tshig che //
translated: The great samaya of the three vajra secrets

original: rang gi mthu yi sbyor byed ba //
analyzed: rang gi mthu yi sbyor byed ba //
translated: is united with one’s own power.

original: rtag tu mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: rtag tu mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis //
translated: Always united with equipoise,

original: dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas bzhugs te //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas bzhugs te //
translated: one resides in the place of the great maṇḍala.

original: @132a *// dri med byang chub sems kyi tshul //
analyzed: @132a *// dri med byang chub sems kyi tshul //
translated: The way of stainless bodhicitta

original: 'gro rnams tshogs bcas dag par byas //
analyzed: 'gro rnams tshogs bcas dag par byas //
translated: purifies all migrating beings.

original: rtag tu gsang sngags brjod byas shing //
analyzed: rtag tu gsang sngags brjod byas shing //
translated: Always reciting the mantra,

original: rdo rje mgon po'i sgo gsal brtan //
analyzed: rdo rje mgon po'i sgo gsal brtan //
translated: the door of Vajra Protector is clear and stable.

original: rtag tu gtor sbyin btang byas te //
analyzed: rtag tu gtor sbyin btang byas te //
translated: Always performing the bali offering,

original: khams kyi 'dzin pa med par grol //
analyzed: khams kyi 'dzin pa med par grol //
translated: liberated without grasping to elements,

original: rtag tu lha la mchod byas te //
analyzed: rtag tu lha la mchod byas te //
translated: always making offerings to the deity,

original: rang gi 'dud rtsis mchod cing rol //
analyzed: rang gi 'dud rtsis mchod cing rol //
translated: offering and enjoying one's own amṛta,

original: rtag tu mi gnyis bstod bya ba //
analyzed: rtag tu mi gnyis bstod bya ba //
translated: always praising nonduality,

original: rnam grol thams cad brag ca'i sgra //
analyzed: rnam grol thams cad brag ca'i sgra //

original: pha rol phyin bcu dus gcig tu //
analyzed: pha rol phyin bcu dus gcig tu //
translated: The ten perfections are simultaneous,

original: padma cho ga rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: padma cho ga rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: realizing the ritual of the lotus.🔽The five kāyas of the exhaustion of defilements,

original: zag pa zad pas sku lnga dang // padma'i rigs kun mnyam par sbyor //
analyzed: zag pa zad pas sku lnga dang // padma'i rigs kun mnyam par sbyor //
translated: the union of all the lotus family,

original: padma'i dam tshig la gnas pa //
analyzed: padma'i dam tshig la gnas pa //
translated: abiding in the samaya of the lotus,

original: gnas kun dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gnas kun dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur //
translated: all places are the clear maṇḍala.

original: padma rang gi gnas su bsgom //
analyzed: padma rang gi gnas su bsgom //
translated: Meditate on the lotus in one's own place,

original: 'dod chags chos kun spyod pa yi //
analyzed: 'dod chags chos kun spyod pa yi //
translated: the conduct of all phenomena of passion,

original: mgon po rang rang gnas la gsal //
analyzed: mgon po rang rang gnas la gsal //
translated: the lord is clear in one's own place,

original: dri med dag pa'i thig le las //
analyzed: dri med dag pa'i thig le las //
translated: from the stainless pure bindu,

original: 'od zer lnga yi snang ba bcas //
analyzed: 'od zer lnga yi snang ba bcas //
translated: the appearance of the five lights

original: rang gi gnas nas 'phro mdzad cing //
analyzed: rang gi gnas nas 'phro mdzad cing //
translated: emanates from one's own place,

original: de nyid mgon po'i sku 'dod gzugs //
analyzed: de nyid mgon po'i sku 'dod gzugs //

original: kun du padma chags med pas //
analyzed: kun du padma chags med pas //
translated: Since the lotus is everywhere without attachment,

original: gnas kun dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gnas kun dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur //
translated: all places will be clear maṇḍalas.🔽After perfecting the signs and characteristics

original: thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams dang // dpe byad rdzogs par gyur nas ni //
analyzed: thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams dang // dpe byad rdzogs par gyur nas ni //
translated: of the Great Sage,

original: yon tan ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas //
analyzed: yon tan ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas //
translated: the place of the arising of all qualities,🔽the supreme, arrogant buddha,

analyzed: kun du dregs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog ;rdo rje'i dam tshig la gnas pas //
translated: abiding in the vajra pledge,

original: rdo rje rang gi gnas su bsgom //
analyzed: rdo rje rang gi gnas su bsgom //
translated: meditate on the vajra in one’s own place.

original: 'od 'phros 'dus pa'i gnas phyag rgya'i //
analyzed: 'od 'phros 'dus pa'i gnas phyag rgya'i //
translated: The light rays radiate and gather, and the place of the seal

original: ye shes mnyam nyid kun don mdzad //
analyzed: ye shes mnyam nyid kun don mdzad //
translated: is the gnosis of uniformity, acting for the benefit of all.

original: thugs rjes rnam mang @132b yul bral zhing //
analyzed: thugs rjes rnam mang @132b yul bral zhing //
translated: Compassion is free from the many objects

original: 'joms par mdzad pa khro bo'i sku //
analyzed: 'joms par mdzad pa khro bo'i sku //

original: rang gi dkyil 'khor dri bral ba //
analyzed: rang gi dkyil 'khor dri bral ba //
translated: The maṇḍala that is free from stains

original: mngon sum gsang ba'i ye shes sku //
analyzed: mngon sum gsang ba'i ye shes sku //
translated: is the gnosis of the secret direct perception.

original: 'khor lo'i dam tshig la gnas pas //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i dam tshig la gnas pas //
translated: Abiding in the pledge of the cakra,

original: 'khor lo rang yi gnas su bsgom //
analyzed: 'khor lo rang yi gnas su bsgom //
translated: meditate on the cakra in one’s own place.

original: rgyal ba kun gyi rin po che //
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi rin po che //
translated: The jewel of all victors

original: 'phro 'du nyi shu rtsa lnga'i tshogs //
analyzed: 'phro 'du nyi shu rtsa lnga'i tshogs //
translated: is the assembly of the twenty-five emanations and reabsorptions.

original: phung po khams rnams rnam dag cing //
analyzed: phung po khams rnams rnam dag cing //
translated: The aggregates and elements are completely pure,

original: 'phrin las ye shes bla na med //
analyzed: 'phrin las ye shes bla na med //
translated: And the activity and wisdom are unsurpassed.🔽Abiding in the attire of pure enlightenment,

original: byang chub dag pa'i cha lugs gnas; ;dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i byin rlabs sku //
analyzed: byang chub dag pa'i cha lugs gnas; ;dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i byin rlabs sku //
translated: The emanated mandala is the blessed body.

original: dga' ba'i thabs dang shes rab sbyor //
analyzed: dga' ba'i thabs dang shes rab sbyor //

original: phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin gnas //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin gnas //

original: rnal 'byor dad brtson ting 'dzin ldan //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dad brtson ting 'dzin ldan //
translated: The yogi with faith, diligence, and samādhi

original: 'grub 'gyur ring por thogs med spyod //
analyzed: 'grub 'gyur ring por thogs med spyod //
