original: ces gsungs pas 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams mnyes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ces gsungs pas 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams mnyes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus it is said, and the assembly of bodhisattvas in the retinue are delighted.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las /
translated: From the Tantra of the Glorious Supreme Horse Play, the Unsurpassed Secret of the Transcendent Wisdom of All Tathāgatas,

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste drug pa'o ////
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste drug pa'o ////
translated: This is the sixth chapter on samādhi.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te dga' ba'i mchod pa dang gar thabs kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes par byas nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te gsol ba btab bo //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te dga' ba'i mchod pa dang gar thabs kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes par byas nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te gsol ba btab bo //
translated: Then the bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi rose from his seat and, with offerings of joy and dance, pleased the entire maṇḍala. Having bowed to the bhagavān, he made a request:

original: kye ma rgyal ba kun gyi gtso //
analyzed: kye ma rgyal ba kun gyi gtso //
translated: “Oh, chief of all the victors,

original: sangs rgyas tshogs rnams skyed pa'i yab //🔽khyed kyis dkyil 'khor sprul mdzad nas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas tshogs rnams skyed pa'i yab // khyed kyis dkyil 'khor sprul mdzad nas //
translated: father who generates the assembly of buddhas,🔽having emanated this maṇḍala,

original: gdul bya'i lam 'di grol byas na //
analyzed: gdul bya'i lam 'di grol byas na //
translated: having liberated this path of those to be tamed,

original: phyi yi 'gro ba ci ltar gzung //
analyzed: phyi yi 'gro ba ci ltar gzung //
translated: how will you guide outer beings?

original: gang dag dbang po ma smin pa'i //
analyzed: gang dag dbang po ma smin pa'i //
translated: Those whose faculties are unripened

original: dkar po chos rnams mthong mi 'gyur //
analyzed: dkar po chos rnams mthong mi 'gyur //
translated: will not see the white dharmas.

original: @133a *// de dag thugs rje chen po yis //
analyzed: @133a *// de dag thugs rje chen po yis //
translated: Those who are held by great compassion

original: bzung zhing las la gzhug par snang //
analyzed: bzung zhing las la gzhug par snang //
translated: will appear to be engaged in activity.

original: ma 'ongs 'gro ba la la dag /
analyzed: ma 'ongs 'gro ba la la dag /
translated: In the future, some beings

original: 'di ltar dkyil 'khor mthong ba rnams //
analyzed: 'di ltar dkyil 'khor mthong ba rnams //
translated: who see the maṇḍala in this way

original: ji ltar dkyil 'khor brtan par 'dul //
analyzed: ji ltar dkyil 'khor brtan par 'dul //
translated: will be disciplined by the stable maṇḍala.🔽How is that?”

original: zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The bhagavān replied:

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Oh son of a good family!

original: ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba theg pa gsang sngags kyi lam du 'jug par 'dod bdag gis ni /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba theg pa gsang sngags kyi lam du 'jug par 'dod bdag gis ni /
translated: I, who wish to enter the path of the Secret Mantra

original: rdo rje slob dpon la brten te gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon la brten te gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: in the future, will do so by relying on a vajra master and entering a mandala of colored particles.

original: rdo rje slob dpon blo gros mchog /
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon blo gros mchog /
translated: The vajra master is of the highest intelligence,

original: dad brtson shes rab stobs dang ldan //
analyzed: dad brtson shes rab stobs dang ldan //
translated: endowed with faith, diligence, and the power of wisdom.

original: bdag chos ma lus shas gyur nas //
analyzed: bdag chos ma lus shas gyur nas //
translated: Having become a vessel for the entire Dharma,

original: skyob pa byang sems sdom pa blang //
analyzed: skyob pa byang sems sdom pa blang //
translated: I will take the vow of the bodhisattva, the protector.🔽Having established the four bodhisattva practices of compassion,

original: byang sems snying rje chen po dang // dga' ba btang snyoms bzhi bzhag nas //
analyzed: byang sems snying rje chen po dang // dga' ba btang snyoms bzhi bzhag nas //
translated: joy, and equanimity,

original: sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer //
analyzed: sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer //
translated: I will invite all sentient beings as my guests

original: slar nyid byang chub lam la dgod //
analyzed: slar nyid byang chub lam la dgod //
translated: and place them on the path to enlightenment.🔽By abiding well in the six perfections

original: pha rol phyin pa drug rnams dang // bsdu ba bzhi la legs gnas pas //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa drug rnams dang // bsdu ba bzhi la legs gnas pas //
translated: and the four means of gathering disciples,

original: theg pa chen po'i lam gnyer zhing //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i lam gnyer zhing //

original: nyan thos la sogs blos pa med pa'i blos //
analyzed: nyan thos la sogs blos pa med pa'i blos //

original: gsang ba'i theg pa don gnyer zhing //
analyzed: gsang ba'i theg pa don gnyer zhing //
translated: I will pursue the meaning of the Secret Vehicle

original: dkyil 'khor dbang thob dam tshig ldan //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dbang thob dam tshig ldan //
translated: and, having obtained empowerment in the mandala,🔽I will uphold the sacred pledges.

original: gsang ba'i rgyud rnams don shes shing //
analyzed: gsang ba'i rgyud rnams don shes shing //
translated: And understand the meaning of the secret tantras,

original: de nyid bcu la goms gyur pas //
analyzed: de nyid bcu la goms gyur pas //
translated: And are familiar with the ten principles,

original: rang gi ye shes rnam grol zhing //
analyzed: rang gi ye shes rnam grol zhing //
translated: Their own pristine consciousness is liberated

original: dngos po de nyid brtan par gnas //🔽mu stegs la sogs mi bskyod cing //
analyzed: dngos po de nyid brtan par gnas // mu stegs la sogs mi bskyod cing //
translated: And they abide stably in the reality of entities.🔽They are unshakable by tīrthikas and so on,

original: theg dman la sogs 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: theg dman la sogs 'gyur ba med //
translated: And they are unchanging by the lower vehicles and so on.

original: rtag tu 'gro ba gzung ba'i blos //
analyzed: rtag tu 'gro ba gzung ba'i blos //
translated: Always holding migrating beings in their minds,

analyzed: @133b dkyil 'khor la sogs las la brtson // mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa yi //
translated: They are diligent in maṇḍalas and so on.

original: grong khyer chen por 'gro byed dpon //
analyzed: grong khyer chen por 'gro byed dpon //
translated: The leader who goes to the great city🔽Of nonabiding nirvāṇa🔽Is diligent in the world and abandons

original: 'jig rten drag brtson chos brgyad dag /🔽btang snyoms spong len med pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten drag brtson chos brgyad dag / btang snyoms spong len med pa //

original: nyid; ;dmus long tshogs kyi dmig bu bas //
analyzed: nyid; ;dmus long tshogs kyi dmig bu bas //
translated: The one who is like a blind person in the assembly

original: bla ma'i gtso bor gzung bar bya //
analyzed: bla ma'i gtso bor gzung bar bya //
translated: Should be taken as the principal guru.

original: 'jug pa'i gang zag phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i gang zag phun sum tshogs //
translated: The perfect person who enters🔽Is peaceful, gentle, and speaks pleasantly,

original: zhi des gsong por smra ba dang // 'jam zhing 'gro ba'i yid /
analyzed: zhi des gsong por smra ba dang // 'jam zhing 'gro ba'i yid /
translated: Is smooth, and has a mind that goes to the world,

original: 'ong pa; ;rtse gcig dad pa brtson 'gyur byed //
analyzed: 'ong pa; ;rtse gcig dad pa brtson 'gyur byed //
translated: Is one-pointed, faithful, and diligent.

original: blo gros yon tan kun la 'jug /
analyzed: blo gros yon tan kun la 'jug /
translated: The mind is engaged in all good qualities,

original: lha dang bla ma la sogs gus //
analyzed: lha dang bla ma la sogs gus //
translated: And one is respectful to the guru and so on.

original: theg pa chen po'i lam dag pas //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i lam dag pas //
translated: And the path of the Great Vehicle is pure,🔽Abandoning the collection of evil, he abides elsewhere.

original: ngan pa'i chogs spangs gzhan du gnas; ;de ni blo gros bzang po yon tan ldan //
analyzed: ngan pa'i chogs spangs gzhan du gnas; ;de ni blo gros bzang po yon tan ldan //
translated: He is of good intellect and endowed with qualities,

original: theg chen gsang ba 'dzin pa'i snod //
analyzed: theg chen gsang ba 'dzin pa'i snod //
translated: A vessel for holding the secret of the Great Vehicle.

original: sa mchog shin tu dben pa'i gnas //
analyzed: sa mchog shin tu dben pa'i gnas //
translated: The supreme stage is a very secluded place,🔽A mountain, a forest, with abundant fruits,

original: ri bo nags tshal 'bras bu dang // me tog chu rgyun phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: ri bo nags tshal 'bras bu dang // me tog chu rgyun phun sum tshogs //
translated: Flowers, and water,

original: gnod byed skye bo tshogs bral ba //
analyzed: gnod byed skye bo tshogs bral ba //
translated: Free of crowds of harmful people.

original: rnal 'byor grogs bcas dga' 'gyur pa'i //
analyzed: rnal 'byor grogs bcas dga' 'gyur pa'i //
translated: A place where the yogi and his friends will rejoice,

original: bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i mchog /
analyzed: bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i mchog /
translated: With self-control, free of obstacles,🔽The best.

original: bsnyen pa ji bzhin rdzogs pa yis //
analyzed: bsnyen pa ji bzhin rdzogs pa yis //
translated: Having completed the approach as prescribed,

original: dkyil 'khor bri sogs las rnams bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bri sogs las rnams bya //
translated: One should perform the activities such as drawing the maṇḍala.

original: phun sum tshogs pa bdun ldan pas //🔽bdag gnas sa gzhi'i grogs bcas dang // mchod rdzas yo byad ma lus pa //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa bdun ldan pas // bdag gnas sa gzhi'i grogs bcas dang // mchod rdzas yo byad ma lus pa //
translated: Endowed with the seven perfections,

original: bsrung zhing byin gyis brlab par bya //
analyzed: bsrung zhing byin gyis brlab par bya //
translated: One should guard and bless🔽Without exception, one's own place, the ground, one's companions,🔽And all the offering substances and articles.

original: rdo rje sa gzhi ra ba dang // gur dang bla re bcas pa yis //
analyzed: rdo rje sa gzhi ra ba dang // gur dang bla re bcas pa yis //
translated: The vajra ground, enclosure,🔽Canopy, and so forth,

original: khro bo me 'od mtshon cha'i tshogs //
analyzed: khro bo me 'od mtshon cha'i tshogs //
translated: The wrathful ones, blazing fires, and the assembly of weapons,

original: bsrung zhing 'khor lo rim bzhin bsgom //🔽sems can tham @134a *//
analyzed: bsrung zhing 'khor lo rim bzhin bsgom // sems can tham @134a *//
translated: One should guard them and meditate on the wheels in sequence.

original: cad bsgral ba'i blos //
analyzed: cad bsgral ba'i blos //
translated: With the intention of liberating all sentient beings,

original: bsod nams tshogs kyis dag par bya //
analyzed: bsod nams tshogs kyis dag par bya //
translated: One should purify with the accumulation of merit.🔽Prostrating, making offerings,

original: phyag 'tshal mchod pa dbul ba dang // sdig bshags bsod nams rjes yi rang //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal mchod pa dbul ba dang // sdig bshags bsod nams rjes yi rang //
translated: Confessing negative actions, rejoicing in merit,

original: sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'da' zhing //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'da' zhing //
translated: Requesting the buddhas not to pass into nirvana,🔽Requesting the wheel of dharma to be turned,🔽Offering one's body, generating bodhichitta,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // lus dbul byang sems bskyed pa dang // lam gnas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // lus dbul byang sems bskyed pa dang // lam gnas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo //
translated: And dedicating the roots of virtue to abiding on the path,

original: rgya cher yongs su bsngo byas shing //
analyzed: rgya cher yongs su bsngo byas shing //
translated: Having dedicated extensively,

original: sems can don du smon lam gdab //
analyzed: sems can don du smon lam gdab //
translated: One should make aspirations for the benefit of sentient beings.

original: dmigs med pa yi rang bzhin gyis //
analyzed: dmigs med pa yi rang bzhin gyis //
translated: With the nature of non-conceptuality,

original: de dag brtson bral nam mkha' bzhin //🔽rnam thar gsum las 'das pa yi //
analyzed: de dag brtson bral nam mkha' bzhin // rnam thar gsum las 'das pa yi //
translated: They are free from effort, like space.🔽The great wisdom of suchness

original: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes che //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes che //
translated: Surpasses the three doors of liberation.

original: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ste //
analyzed: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ste //
translated: Everything has the characteristic of space,

original: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
analyzed: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
translated: But space itself has no characteristics.

original: nam mkha' 'dra ba rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: nam mkha' 'dra ba rnal 'byor pas //
translated: The yogi who is like space

original: don kun mnyam pa nyid la gsal //
analyzed: don kun mnyam pa nyid la gsal //
translated: Is clear in the equality of all meanings.

original: de la rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshogs //
analyzed: de la rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshogs //
translated: The assembly of emanations

original: dkyil 'khor chen po sprul byas pas //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po sprul byas pas //
translated: Emanates the great maṇḍala.

original: rigs kyi zhing khams sbyong byed cing //
analyzed: rigs kyi zhing khams sbyong byed cing //
translated: The buddhafields of the family are purified

original: rnal 'byor chen po las kun 'grub //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po las kun 'grub //
translated: And the great yoga accomplishes all activities.

original: sa phyogs dri med yid 'ong ba'i //🔽grong ngam grong khyer dgon pa 'am //
analyzed: sa phyogs dri med yid 'ong ba'i // grong ngam grong khyer dgon pa 'am //
translated: In a place that is clean and pleasing,🔽Either a town, a city, a forest,

original: ri phug nags tshal gang rung bar //
analyzed: ri phug nags tshal gang rung bar //
translated: A mountain cave, or a forest,

original: nyams dga' yan lag rtag par bya //
analyzed: nyams dga' yan lag rtag par bya //
translated: Always do what is delightful.

original: gang du bzang ni 'bras bu bcas //
analyzed: gang du bzang ni 'bras bu bcas //
translated: Wherever there are good fruits,

original: ne'u sing chu 'gram me tog bcas //
analyzed: ne'u sing chu 'gram me tog bcas //
translated: A garden, a riverbank, or flowers,

original: dpal rdzogs yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas //
analyzed: dpal rdzogs yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas //
translated: The place that is the source of perfect, glorious qualities

original: de ni rab gus brtag par bya //
analyzed: de ni rab gus brtag par bya //
translated: Should be examined with great respect.🔽The sky is a web of maṇḍalas,🔽The ground is a web of lotuses,

original: nam mkha' 'khor lo dra ba dang // sa gzhi padma dra ba dang // bkra shis phun sum sna tshogs gzhi //
analyzed: nam mkha' 'khor lo dra ba dang // sa gzhi padma dra ba dang // bkra shis phun sum sna tshogs gzhi //
translated: And the basis of various perfect auspiciousness

original: bar chad med pa'i mtshan nyid yin //
analyzed: bar chad med pa'i mtshan nyid yin //
translated: Is the characteristic of being free of obstacles.

original: sa gzhi zhos rdib @134b med pa yi //
analyzed: sa gzhi zhos rdib @134b med pa yi //
translated: The ground is not sunken in the middle,

original: dbus su mtho ba phyag rgya che //
analyzed: dbus su mtho ba phyag rgya che //
translated: But high in the center, the great seal.

original: shar dang byang du gzhol ba ni //
analyzed: shar dang byang du gzhol ba ni //
translated: If it slopes to the east and north,

original: 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i dngos grub 'gyur //
analyzed: 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i dngos grub 'gyur //
translated: The four activities will be accomplished.

original: lho dang nub tu gzhol pas ni //
analyzed: lho dang nub tu gzhol pas ni //
translated: If it slopes to the south or west,

original: 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub 'gyur //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub 'gyur //
translated: it is for mundane accomplishments.

original: nub dang byang du gzhol ba ni //
analyzed: nub dang byang du gzhol ba ni //
translated: If it slopes to the west or north,

original: ting 'dzin phra mo'i las gzhan 'gyur //
analyzed: ting 'dzin phra mo'i las gzhan 'gyur //
translated: it is for other activities of subtle meditative absorption.🔽One should avoid a site that is high in the east

original: gang zhig shar phyogs mtho ba dang // dbus su dma' ba spang bar bya //
analyzed: gang zhig shar phyogs mtho ba dang // dbus su dma' ba spang bar bya //
translated: and low in the center.

original: sa de pus mo nub tsam du //
analyzed: sa de pus mo nub tsam du //
translated: That site should be dug up to the depth of a knee🔽and filled up again.

original: brkos te slar yang dgang par bya; ;med 'phel gyur na dngos grub mchog /
analyzed: brkos te slar yang dgang par bya; ;med 'phel gyur na dngos grub mchog /
translated: If it increases, it is for the supreme accomplishment;

original: gang bar gyur pa shis pa yin //
analyzed: gang bar gyur pa shis pa yin //
translated: if it is full, it is auspicious.

original: dma' zhing ma legs gyur pa yin //
analyzed: dma' zhing ma legs gyur pa yin //
translated: If it decreases, it is not good.

original: sol dum rus sogs byung na yang //
analyzed: sol dum rus sogs byung na yang //
translated: If there are pieces of charcoal, bones, and so forth,

original: yang na chu yis dgang byas te //
analyzed: yang na chu yis dgang byas te //
translated: or if there is water,

original: slob dpon rdo rje dril 'dzin pas //
analyzed: slob dpon rdo rje dril 'dzin pas //
translated: the master, holding the vajra and bell,

original: mnyam bzhag lha yi sngags brjod cing //
analyzed: mnyam bzhag lha yi sngags brjod cing //
translated: reciting the mantra of the deity in equipoise,

original: shar du mi drag gom pa brgyad //
analyzed: shar du mi drag gom pa brgyad //
translated: should walk eight steps to the east,

original: song ste slar log blta bar bya //
analyzed: song ste slar log blta bar bya //
translated: return, and look.

original: 'grib pa med na dngos grub 'gyur //
analyzed: 'grib pa med na dngos grub 'gyur //
translated: If there is no decrease, there will be accomplishment.

original: snang dang mi snad sa yi bdag ;mgu byas rin gyis nyo ba dang // blangs te bar chad med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: snang dang mi snad sa yi bdag ;mgu byas rin gyis nyo ba dang // blangs te bar chad med pa'i phyir //
translated: The lord of the ground, whether visible or not, is pleased, bought with a price,

original: bgegs gzhan phra mo bskrad par bya //
analyzed: bgegs gzhan phra mo bskrad par bya //
translated: and taken, in order to remove obstacles.

original: bar chad med pa'i sa dbus na //
analyzed: bar chad med pa'i sa dbus na //
translated: In the middle of the ground free of obstacles,

original: rigs kyi bdag po 'byor ldan pas //
analyzed: rigs kyi bdag po 'byor ldan pas //
translated: the lord of the family, endowed with wealth,

original: chos gos la sogs rgyan thogs shing //
analyzed: chos gos la sogs rgyan thogs shing //
translated: wearing ornaments such as Dharma robes,

original: padma'i dkyil 'khor legs bzhugs te //
analyzed: padma'i dkyil 'khor legs bzhugs te //
translated: well-seated on a lotus mandala,

original: 'khor lo sgyur rgyal cha lugs kyis //
analyzed: 'khor lo sgyur rgyal cha lugs kyis //
translated: in the attire of a universal monarch,

original: mchod sogs sbyang zhing byin brlabs te //
analyzed: mchod sogs sbyang zhing byin brlabs te //
translated: having purified and consecrated offerings, etc.,

original: rdo rje bsrung pa'i phyag rgya yis //
analyzed: rdo rje bsrung pa'i phyag rgya yis //
translated: with the mudra of Vajra Protection,

original: phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rig par bcas //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rig par bcas //
translated: the mandalas of the ten directions, together with the awarenesses,

original: sa yi lha mo srung ma rnams //
analyzed: sa yi lha mo srung ma rnams //
translated: the goddess of the ground, and the protectors,

original: spyan drangs mchod pas mnyes par bya //
analyzed: spyan drangs mchod pas mnyes par bya //
translated: are invited and pleased with offerings.

original: khyad par sa yi bdag po dang // 'gro drug @135a *//
analyzed: khyad par sa yi bdag po dang // 'gro drug @135a *//
translated: In particular, the lord of the ground, and the beings of the six migrations,

original: bgegs rnams ma lus kun //
analyzed: bgegs rnams ma lus kun //
translated: all obstacles without exception,

original: dgug cing bu lon mchod sbyin gtang //
analyzed: dgug cing bu lon mchod sbyin gtang //
translated: are summoned and offered a ransom.

original: dri zhim chu yis kun gtor zhing //
analyzed: dri zhim chu yis kun gtor zhing //
translated: Having sprinkled everywhere with fragrant water,

original: sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang bar bya //
translated: they are purified with mantras and mudras.

original: gang zhig dngos grub la sogs 'dod; ;rab 'bring tha ma grub don du //
analyzed: gang zhig dngos grub la sogs 'dod; ;rab 'bring tha ma grub don du //
translated: for the sake of the highest, middling, and lowest accomplishments,🔽should perform the consecration of the ground

original: lto 'phye brtag pa'i cho ga bzhin //🔽yan lag kun dbang rgya yang bya //
analyzed: lto 'phye brtag pa'i cho ga bzhin // yan lag kun dbang rgya yang bya //
translated: according to the procedure for examining the tortoise.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor rgyar mnyam pa'i //
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor rgyar mnyam pa'i //
translated: Then, the ground of the maṇḍala, equal in size,

original: sa gzhi khru la sogs tshad du //
analyzed: sa gzhi khru la sogs tshad du //
translated: should be dug to the measure of a cubit and so forth,

original: brkos te sa yi skyon bsal zhing //🔽sa zhag mdog bzang 'jam phyen pas //
analyzed: brkos te sa yi skyon bsal zhing // sa zhag mdog bzang 'jam phyen pas //
translated: and the faults of the ground should be removed.🔽With good-colored clay, smooth and fine,

original: gang zhig dri zhim chur bcas pa'i //
analyzed: gang zhig dri zhim chur bcas pa'i //
translated: mixed with fragrant water,

original: sngags btab gang zhig 'thas par bcag /
analyzed: sngags btab gang zhig 'thas par bcag /
translated: one should smear it with mantra-infused clay.🔽The maṇḍala for practice should be one cubit high,

original: bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor khru dor bstod; ;rgyar ni khru drug pa yi tshad //
analyzed: bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor khru dor bstod; ;rgyar ni khru drug pa yi tshad //
translated: six cubits in width,

original: tshogs bsag khru gang 'phang du bstod //
analyzed: tshogs bsag khru gang 'phang du bstod //
translated: one cubit in height for the accumulation of merit,

original: mtha' skor khru gang pa yi tshad //🔽dbang bskur sor bzhi'i tshad bstod de //
analyzed: mtha' skor khru gang pa yi tshad // dbang bskur sor bzhi'i tshad bstod de //
translated: and one cubit in circumference.🔽The consecration should be four finger-widths high,

original: ji ltar gru bzhi rgyar bskyed cing //
analyzed: ji ltar gru bzhi rgyar bskyed cing //
translated: and should be extended in width like a square,

original: dbyibs legs me long bzhin du gnas //
analyzed: dbyibs legs me long bzhin du gnas //
translated: well-shaped, and placed like a mirror.

original: tshad mnyam grog sbur la sogs pa //
analyzed: tshad mnyam grog sbur la sogs pa //
translated: Even, without ants and so forth,

original: rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // snying po lnga dang 'bru lnga dag /
analyzed: rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // snying po lnga dang 'bru lnga dag /
translated: the five essences, and the five grains,

original: dri chu sngags kyis btab byas nas //
analyzed: dri chu sngags kyis btab byas nas //
translated: having consecrated them with the mantra of the water for drinking,

original: dkyil 'khor snying por gzhag par bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor snying por gzhag par bya //
translated: one should place them in the center of the maṇḍala.

original: phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs te //
analyzed: phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs te //
translated: Observing the sameness of all directions,

original: stong pa nyid kyi sngags kyis sbyang //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi sngags kyis sbyang //
translated: one should purify with the mantra of emptiness.

original: dri zhim sngags kyis byin brlabs pa'i //
analyzed: dri zhim sngags kyis byin brlabs pa'i //
translated: Having consecrated with the fragrant mantra

original: chu rgyun phyogs bcur gtor byas shing //
analyzed: chu rgyun phyogs bcur gtor byas shing //
translated: the stream of water that is scattered in the ten directions,

original: sna tshogs gtor mas mnyes byas te //
analyzed: sna tshogs gtor mas mnyes byas te //
translated: one should please with the various offerings

original: lha tshogs mgron rnams tshim par bya //
analyzed: lha tshogs mgron rnams tshim par bya //
translated: and satisfy the host of guests, the deities.

original: slob dpon rigs kyi gtsor gnas pa'i //
analyzed: slob dpon rigs kyi gtsor gnas pa'i //
translated: The master, abiding in the principal family,

original: rgyan dang cha lugs rdzogs byas nas //
analyzed: rgyan dang cha lugs rdzogs byas nas //
translated: having perfected the ornaments and attire,

original: @135b sgrub pa'i grogs mchog blo gros ldan //
analyzed: @135b sgrub pa'i grogs mchog blo gros ldan //
translated: the excellent friend of accomplishment, endowed with intelligence,

original: tshul bzhin du ni gsol ba btab //
analyzed: tshul bzhin du ni gsol ba btab //
translated: having properly made a request,

original: dbus kyi sa yi char gnas pa //
analyzed: dbus kyi sa yi char gnas pa //
translated: abiding in the center of the ground,

original: kun 'byung nam mkha' dag pa'i sngags //
analyzed: kun 'byung nam mkha' dag pa'i sngags //
translated: reciting the mantra of the origin, the pure sky,

original: brjod cing 'byung ba'i sa bon las /
analyzed: brjod cing 'byung ba'i sa bon las /
translated: from the seed syllable of origin

original: dkyil 'khor ri brtsegs bsgom par bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ri brtsegs bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate on the maṇḍala of the mountain peak.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa sar bzhag cing //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa sar bzhag cing //
translated: The vajra-binding is placed on the ground,

original: byams pa'i rdo rje rnam dag cing //
analyzed: byams pa'i rdo rje rnam dag cing //
translated: and the pure vajra of love,

original: rdo rje dkyil 'khor thugs dang bcas //
analyzed: rdo rje dkyil 'khor thugs dang bcas //
translated: the vajra maṇḍala with the mind,🔽the sign of the hand, the beginning and end of the ornament,

original: phyag mtshan dran pa thog mthar rgyan; ;rdo rje sa gzhi ra ba dang // gur sogs khro bo me 'od bcas //
analyzed: phyag mtshan dran pa thog mthar rgyan; ;rdo rje sa gzhi ra ba dang // gur sogs khro bo me 'od bcas //
translated: the vajra ground, the enclosure, the pavilion, and so forth, with the wrathful fire light,

original: gtso bo gar gyi dbang phyug skus //
analyzed: gtso bo gar gyi dbang phyug skus //
translated: the principal one with the body of the lord of dance,

original: bad bcas thal mo lan gsum brdab //
analyzed: bad bcas thal mo lan gsum brdab //
translated: with the palms joined three times,

original: 'od 'phros gnas kun g-yos pa la //
analyzed: 'od 'phros gnas kun g-yos pa la //
translated: the light radiates, and all the abodes shake.

original: lha mo gser mdog rgyan gyis mdzes //
analyzed: lha mo gser mdog rgyan gyis mdzes //
translated: The goddess, golden in color, adorned with ornaments,

original: me tog phreng ba bum thogs pa'i //
analyzed: me tog phreng ba bum thogs pa'i //
translated: holding a flower garland and a vase,

original: lus phyed sa las thon byas te //
analyzed: lus phyed sa las thon byas te //
translated: with half of her body emerging from the ground,

original: mthun na bka' nyan tshul du gnas //
analyzed: mthun na bka' nyan tshul du gnas //
translated: if in agreement, remains in the manner of listening to the command.🔽Making offerings, praises, and offering water for the face, and so forth,

original: mchod bstod zhal bsil sogs 'bul zhing; ;dri zhing las rnams ma rdzogs par //
analyzed: mchod bstod zhal bsil sogs 'bul zhing; ;dri zhing las rnams ma rdzogs par //
translated: inquiring about the activities, as long as they are not completed,

original: de srid mi 'gyur brtan bzhugs nas //
analyzed: de srid mi 'gyur brtan bzhugs nas //
translated: remaining firm and unchanging,

original: bdud sogs bsgo ba'i dag bcas mdzad //
analyzed: bdud sogs bsgo ba'i dag bcas mdzad //
translated: the command of the māras and so forth is accomplished.🔽The conduct and the special way

original: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //🔽spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis //
analyzed: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //🔽spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis //
translated: of all the protector buddhas,

original: sa dang pha rol phyin pa las //
analyzed: sa dang pha rol phyin pa las //
translated: And the stages and perfections,

original: lha mo khyod ni dpang du shog /
analyzed: lha mo khyod ni dpang du shog /
translated: Goddess, be my witness!

original: ji ltar rgyal ba thams cad kyi //
analyzed: ji ltar rgyal ba thams cad kyi //
translated: Just as all the Victorious Ones

original: bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms mdzad pa //
analyzed: bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms mdzad pa //
translated: Conquered the hordes of demons,

original: de bzhin bdag gis bdud las kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin bdag gis bdud las kyang //
translated: In the same way, I will also

analyzed: gnod sbyin dri za srin po dang // sha za gshin rje ma mo'i tshogs //

analyzed: sa las yongs su bskor byas te //

analyzed: bgegs byed bya phyir phur par gdab //

analyzed: gar thabs kyis //

analyzed: zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po'i tshul //

analyzed: so so'i gnas su dgram par bya //

analyzed: rdo rje dril 'dzin dpa' bo yis //

analyzed: phyogs rnams kun tu bskor ba bya; ;aom badzra satva sa ma ya /

original: ma nu p'a la ya /
analyzed: ma nu p'a la ya /

analyzed: su to shyo me bha ba / sarba siddhim me pra yatstsha /

analyzed: sarba karma su tsa me /

original: tsittam shr'i yam ku ru h'um/
analyzed: tsittam shr'i yam ku ru h'um/

original: ha ha ha ha ho /
analyzed: ha ha ha ha ho /
translated: Ha ha ha ha ho!

original: bha ga w'a na /
analyzed: bha ga w'a na /

analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra ma me munytsa /

analyzed: badzri bha ba mah'a sa ma ya stva aa:/
translated: I am vajra existence, great pledge, hūṃ!

analyzed: gsang sngags rgyal po bla med pa'i //

analyzed: lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis kyang //

analyzed: sdig pa ma lus zad byed cing //

analyzed: las rnams thams cad 'grub par byed // pus mo sa la btsugs byas te //

analyzed: lag pa g-yas pa spos 'dzin cing //

analyzed: g-yon pa dril bu dkrol byas te //

original: tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya //
analyzed: tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya //

analyzed: aom bder gshegs stobs bcu brtson ldan 'gro ba'i mgon //

analyzed: @137b rigs gnyis thabs kyis brgyud pa'i dkyil 'khor che //

analyzed: brnyengs pa mi mnga' thugs rje shugs chen po //

analyzed: tshul khrims la sogs phung po mnyes gyur cig / padma gar gyi dbang phyug gtsor byas pa'i //

analyzed: dri bral thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid ni //

analyzed: mnyes pa'i tshogs rnams kun las rnam grol zhing //

analyzed: bde gshegs yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas //

analyzed: 'dod yon 'bras bu phun sum tshogs sgrub dang // 'gro rnams ma lus thugs rjes gzung byed cing //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor rnam dag rgya chen brtson lags na //

analyzed: mgon po'i bka' drin rjes su brtse dgongs te //

analyzed: me tog dri bzang phreng sogs 'di bzhes la //

analyzed: de srid thugs rjes bzung zhing bzhugs nas ni //

analyzed: bdag gi gnas sogs 'di dag byin gyis rlobs //

analyzed: de nas slob ma la bos te /

analyzed: kye rigs kyi bu khyod theg pa'i snod //

analyzed: rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung 'di nyon //

analyzed: dad gus dga' ba'i shugs phyung shog / sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis //
translated: Let the force of faith, respect, and joy arise.🔽This excellent ritual was taught

analyzed: cho ga bzang po 'di bstan bya //
translated: by the tathāgatas of the past.🔽The lords, perfect buddhas,

analyzed: mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams dang // ma byon de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs //

analyzed: de bzhin da lta'i sems can rnams //

original: 'gro la phan phyir gnas bzhugs te //
analyzed: 'gro la phan phyir gnas bzhugs te //
translated: remain in order to benefit migrating beings.🔽This excellent ritual,

original: gsang ba zab mo bla @138a *//
analyzed: gsang ba zab mo bla @138a *//
translated: the unsurpassable, profound secret,

original: na med // chog bzang po 'di spyod pas //
analyzed: na med // chog bzang po 'di spyod pas //

original: skyes mchog rang gi gnas nyid du //
analyzed: skyes mchog rang gi gnas nyid du //

original: kun mkhyen ye shes bde chen brnyes //
analyzed: kun mkhyen ye shes bde chen brnyes //

original: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med par //
analyzed: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med par //

analyzed: padma gar dbang dkyil 'khor gyi // bdud tshogs shin tu mi bzad pa'i //

original: dpung rnams ma lus 'joms par mdzad //🔽de phyir kun mkhyen ye shes kyi //
analyzed: dpung rnams ma lus 'joms par mdzad // de phyir kun mkhyen ye shes kyi //
translated: demons are completely destroyed.🔽Therefore, you should also

original: blo gros mchog 'di khyod kyis kyang //
analyzed: blo gros mchog 'di khyod kyis kyang //
translated: have this supreme intelligence of omniscient wisdom.🔽Always go for refuge

original: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //🔽kun tu skyabs su 'gro bar gyis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la // kun tu skyabs su 'gro bar gyis //

analyzed: rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro gsang sngags can // rigs kyi dkyil 'khor so so yi //

analyzed: 'khor lo bzhugs pa'i tshogs rnams la //

original: kun nas skyabs su 'gro bar gyis //
analyzed: kun nas skyabs su 'gro bar gyis //
translated: always go for refuge.

original: dpa' bo dpa' mo 'khor dang bcas //
analyzed: dpa' bo dpa' mo 'khor dang bcas //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid tshe // khyad par du yang slob dpon la //
translated: and to the bodhisattvas,🔽in particular, go for refuge

original: khyod kyis skyabs su 'gro bar gyis //
analyzed: khyod kyis skyabs su 'gro bar gyis //

original: de nas legs spyod slob ma yis //
analyzed: de nas legs spyod slob ma yis //

analyzed: skyabs 'gro byang sems sdom pa gzung // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //

analyzed: dkon mchog gsum po gzung bar bya // bdag gis sdig pa byas pa dang // bgyid pa rjes su yi rang ba //

original: mgon po'i spyan sngar mchis nas su //
analyzed: mgon po'i spyan sngar mchis nas su //
translated: In the presence of the protector,

original: de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi //
analyzed: de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi //

analyzed: rgyal ba sras bcas 'khor rnams dang // rang rgyal dgra bcom 'gro rnams kyis //

analyzed: bsgom bzlas la sogs bsod nams la //
translated: And in the virtue of all beings.

original: dad pas rjes su yi rang ngo //
analyzed: dad pas rjes su yi rang ngo //
translated: I go for refuge to the bodhisattvas🔽Who are practicing the accumulations🔽And actualizing buddhahood

analyzed: sems nyid mngon par sangs rgyas dang // chos kyi 'khor lo @138b bskor byed pa'i //

analyzed: tshogs spyod byang chub sems dpa' la // bdag ni rab tu skyabs su mchi //
translated: Just as the fortunate bodhisattvas

analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ci lta bar // skal ldan byang chub sems dpa' yis // byang chub sems mchog dri med pas //
translated: In the presence of the buddhas🔽Took the pure, supreme bodhisattva vow

original: 'gro ba rgya che tshogs la dmigs //
analyzed: 'gro ba rgya che tshogs la dmigs //

original: dus gsum bzhugs pa'i 'gro rnams kyis //
analyzed: dus gsum bzhugs pa'i 'gro rnams kyis //

analyzed: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal mdzad pa //

analyzed: de bzhin nyid dbyings byang chub sems //

analyzed: dus gsum dag tu gtang mi bya //

original: rdo rje slob dpon la gus shing //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon la gus shing //

original: dus kun du ni yon tan gzung //
analyzed: dus kun du ni yon tan gzung //

analyzed: rnal 'byor gsang ba smad mi bya //

analyzed: rdo rje spun la mig bzhin blta //

analyzed: gsang sngags phyag rgya'i rnam pa dag /

original: brtson pas dus gsum dran par bya //
analyzed: brtson pas dus gsum dran par bya //

original: de nas shis par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de nas shis par bya ba'i phyir //

analyzed: rang dang mtshan ma'i yi ge sngags //

analyzed: byin brlabs ye shes bskyed par bya; ;slar yang bdug pa me tog dang // mar me dri chab la sogs pa'i //

analyzed: rang gi gnas su 'dug cing dbul //

original: bkra shis shing mchog 'o ma can //
analyzed: bkra shis shing mchog 'o ma can //

analyzed: lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas // rlon pa drang zhing 'bu rjes med //

analyzed: chag gas med pa'i tshems shing ni //

analyzed: sor ni bcu gnyis dri bzang byug /

analyzed: rtse mo me tog phreng btags pa //

original: rigs kyi mtshon char byin brlabs pas //
analyzed: rigs kyi mtshon char byin brlabs pas //

analyzed: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra shi ta ni sv'ah'a /

analyzed: yi ge gsum bcas sngags brjod cing //

analyzed: shar du kha bltas slob ma la //

analyzed: bden pa bdar zhing sbyin bya zhing //

analyzed: phra mo'i phyogs kyis so brus te //

analyzed: sa gzhi dri yis byugs pa ru //

analyzed: phan tshun mi blta dor bar bya //

analyzed: gyen thur rab dang 'bring gis blta //

analyzed: gtsang ma'i ras la legs bkal ba'i //

analyzed: srung skud mdud pa gsum ldan pa'i //

analyzed: yi ge gsum gyis sngags bzlas nas //

analyzed: de yi dpung pa g-yon par bcing //

analyzed: ku sha rtse mo ma 'khrugs pa'i //

analyzed: bam po gnyis su sbams pa yis //

analyzed: yab yum gnyis su byin brlabs pa'i //

analyzed: sngas dang stan du sbyin par bya //

analyzed: dga' ba'i gtam gyis gzengs bstod cing // mchod pa gtor ma'i tshogs bcas pas //

analyzed: lha tshogs rnams la bsngo byas nas //

analyzed: bden pa brjod cing ci bder nyal //

analyzed: mi smra dge pa'i sems bcas pas; ;rmi lam mtshan ma brtag par bya //

analyzed: slar nyid slob dpon nang song ste //

analyzed: de nas skya rengs shar dus su //

analyzed: slob dpon slob ma sngas 'ongs te //

analyzed: kye kye bzhin bzang rnams longs shig /

analyzed: rmi lam mtshan ma ci mthong ba //

original: bden pa brjod pa'i dus yin no //
analyzed: bden pa brjod pa'i dus yin no //

original: des kyang ci bzhin smra bar bya //
analyzed: des kyang ci bzhin smra bar bya //

analyzed: ngan pa'i ltas rnams bzlog par bya //

analyzed: stong pa chen po ye shes bsgom //

analyzed: mchod nas stan la bkram par bya //

analyzed: mgul chings gzungs thag kha rgyan sogs //

analyzed: ye shes sku dang gnyis med par //

analyzed: dam tshig dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas // ye shes lha dang gnyis med pa'i //

original: zur bzhi shin tu legs par gzhal //
analyzed: zur bzhi shin tu legs par gzhal //
translated: measure the four corners well.🔽Draw the second vajra line north and south,

original: rdo rje lho byang gnyis pa dang // mtshams kyi thig rnams gdab par bya //
analyzed: rdo rje lho byang gnyis pa dang // mtshams kyi thig rnams gdab par bya //

original: legs thig gru bzhi mnyam gyur nas //
analyzed: legs thig gru bzhi mnyam gyur nas //

original: brgyad dang bcu drug dag tu bgo /
analyzed: brgyad dang bcu drug dag tu bgo /

original: bar khyams phyi khyams ma gtogs pa'i //
analyzed: bar khyams phyi khyams ma gtogs pa'i //

original: gzhan dag cha phran bzhi bzhir bgo /
analyzed: gzhan dag cha phran bzhi bzhir bgo /
translated: the rest is divided into four cubits.🔽When the rite of the lines is complete,

analyzed: thig gi cho ga rdzogs pa dang // ye shes skud pas mchod bstod cing //

original: rdo rje khu tshur sngags bcas kyis //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur sngags bcas kyis //

original: rang gi gnas su gshegs gsol bya //
analyzed: rang gi gnas su gshegs gsol bya //
translated: one should request them to depart to their own places.

original: aom badzra ga dza:/
analyzed: aom badzra ga dza:/

original: dkyil 'khor bdag po'i nga rgyal gyis //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bdag po'i nga rgyal gyis //
translated: With the pride of being the lord of the maṇḍala,

original: mig gnyis ma dang ta las byung bar bsam //
analyzed: mig gnyis ma dang ta las byung bar bsam //
translated: one should visualize the two eyes arisen from ma and ta.

original: dkyil 'khor gnas rnams kun bltas te //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gnas rnams kun bltas te //

original: sngags dang phyag rgya bcas pa yi //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgya bcas pa yi //

original: sgo dag bzhi po dbye byas nas //
analyzed: sgo dag bzhi po dbye byas nas //
translated: one should open the four doors

original: cha phran dag kyang blo yis brtag /
analyzed: cha phran dag kyang blo yis brtag /

original: rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya yis //
analyzed: rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya yis //

original: ri mo'i mkhar ni btegs byas te; ;'byung 'jug gsang ba'i cho ga dag /
analyzed: ri mo'i mkhar ni btegs byas te; ;'byung 'jug gsang ba'i cho ga dag /

analyzed: rnal 'byor brtan pa yid kyis bya //

original: aom be g'a kra ma h'um/
analyzed: aom be g'a kra ma h'um/
translated: Oṃ vega krama hūṃ

original: padma rang bzhin rnam dag pas //
analyzed: padma rang bzhin rnam dag pas //
translated: With the pure nature of the lotus,

original: dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i gnas chen po //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i gnas chen po //

original: thugs rje ye shes rnam 'phrul tshogs //
analyzed: thugs rje ye shes rnam 'phrul tshogs //

analyzed: khyab mdzad byin rlabs ston pa'i gtso //

analyzed: rgyal ba rnams kyi sku gsung thugs //

original: yon tan 'phrin las rmad du byung //
analyzed: yon tan 'phrin las rmad du byung //

original: ma lus sems can don gyi phyir //
analyzed: ma lus sems can don gyi phyir //

analyzed: pho brang dag par byin gyis brlab //

original: phyogs mtshams ma lus rnam dag pas //
analyzed: phyogs mtshams ma lus rnam dag pas //

analyzed: byang chub ye shes gnas gsal 'gyur // nyon mongs nyes tshogs kun bcom pa'i //

analyzed: thugs rje chen po dri med @141a *// shugs; ;ye shes byin brlabs las byung ba'i //

original: dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub par mdzod //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub par mdzod //

analyzed: rin chen rnam lnga'i phye ma dang // sa tshon la sogs gang 'byor pa //

original: rin po che yi snod blugs te //
analyzed: rin po che yi snod blugs te //

analyzed: dkyil 'khor gnas kyi phyogs lngar gzhag /

analyzed: sbyangs shing byin gyis brlabs byas na //

analyzed: rigs lnga'i skud tshogs yum bcas la //

analyzed: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dbus sogs dang // mchod bstod sngags kyis mnyes par bya //

original: aom badzra tsitta ma ti sa ma ya h'um/
analyzed: aom badzra tsitta ma ti sa ma ya h'um/

analyzed: dkar mthing ser po ljang khu dang // dmar po'i tshon rnams rim bzhin du //

analyzed: dbang ldan mtshams nas brtsam byas te //

analyzed: panytsa r'a ga drang bar bya //

original: g-yas pas padma rdo rje gzung //

original: g-yon pas 'dren pa'i las bya'o //
analyzed: g-yon pas 'dren pa'i las bya'o //

original: de la mchod 'bul sngags brjod cing //
analyzed: de la mchod 'bul sngags brjod cing //

original: bden pa bdar te dgab par bya //
analyzed: bden pa bdar te dgab par bya //

original: 'di ni chos dbyings rnam par dag /
analyzed: 'di ni chos dbyings rnam par dag /

original: sems can khams ni rab sgrol byed //
analyzed: sems can khams ni rab sgrol byed //
translated: which completely liberates the realm of sentient beings.

original: dpal ldan padma gar dbang ni //
analyzed: dpal ldan padma gar dbang ni //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //

original: yang dag bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
analyzed: yang dag bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis //

original: dbus kyi lte ba nas brtsams te //
analyzed: dbus kyi lte ba nas brtsams te //

analyzed: dang po slob dpon gyis bri zhing //

original: phyis ni ci dgar shes par bri //
analyzed: phyis ni ci dgar shes par bri //

analyzed: mtho dman med snyoms drang por bya //

translated: Although enlightenment is accomplished in this lifetime,

original: rmongs rnams the tshom skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rmongs rnams the tshom skye bar 'gyur //
translated: the deluded will give rise to doubt.

original: ngang tshul bzang po 'di rtogs @145a *//
analyzed: ngang tshul bzang po 'di rtogs @145a *//
translated: By realizing this excellent nature,

original: pas; ;dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
analyzed: pas; ;dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
translated: the buddhas abiding in the three times

original: byin rlabs ngo mtshar mchog brnyes te //
analyzed: byin rlabs ngo mtshar mchog brnyes te //
translated: attain the supreme, wondrous blessings

original: sems can don phyir tshul dang ldan //
analyzed: sems can don phyir tshul dang ldan //
translated: and are endowed with the way for the benefit of sentient beings.🔽You should uphold it without exaggeration or denigration,

original: khyod kyis sgro skur dang bral zhing; ;dad brtson the tshom med par zungs //
analyzed: khyod kyis sgro skur dang bral zhing; ;dad brtson the tshom med par zungs //
translated: with faith, diligence, and without doubt.”

original: de nas slob mas slar gsol ba //
analyzed: de nas slob mas slar gsol ba //
translated: Then the disciple made a request:

original: yang dag thugs rje cher mnga' ba'i //🔽mgon mchog rnams kyis bdag la gnong //
analyzed: yang dag thugs rje cher mnga' ba'i // mgon mchog rnams kyis bdag la gnong //
translated: I have offended the supreme protectors,🔽Who possess the great, perfect compassion.🔽

original: 'di dag bdag la gtol med pas //
analyzed: 'di dag bdag la gtol med pas //
translated: I am unable to do these things,🔽so I request you, supreme protectors,🔽who possess the great, perfect compassion,

original: khyod kyis gsungs bzhin gsol bar 'tshal //
analyzed: khyod kyis gsungs bzhin gsol bar 'tshal //
translated: to do as I have requested.

original: slar yang rab gus dang ba'i yid //
analyzed: slar yang rab gus dang ba'i yid //
translated: Again, with a mind of great respect and faith,

original: tshul chen mi nyan dam tshig mchog /
analyzed: tshul chen mi nyan dam tshig mchog /
translated: I will not listen to the great way,

original: slob dpon che la skyabs su mchi //
analyzed: slob dpon che la skyabs su mchi //
translated: but will take refuge in the great master,

original: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sras bcas tshogs //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sras bcas tshogs //
translated: the assembly of buddhas and bodhisattvas,

original: thugs mchog dri med bdag la dgongs //🔽bdag gis byang chub don gnyer bas //
analyzed: thugs mchog dri med bdag la dgongs // bdag gis byang chub don gnyer bas //
translated: and the supreme commitment of the great way.🔽I will generate the aspiration to enter the maṇḍala

original: dkyil 'khor gnas su mos pa bskyed //🔽gar gyi dbang phyug bde chen mchog /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gnas su mos pa bskyed // gar gyi dbang phyug bde chen mchog /
translated: for the sake of pursuing awakening.🔽I will take refuge in the lords of dance,🔽the supreme great bliss,

original: mgon 'gyur rnams la skyabs su mchi //🔽mya ngan las 'das pho brang 'dir //
analyzed: mgon 'gyur rnams la skyabs su mchi // mya ngan las 'das pho brang 'dir //
translated: the protectors.🔽It is excellent that I have entered

original: bdag nyid zhugs par mdzad pa legs //
analyzed: bdag nyid zhugs par mdzad pa legs //
translated: this palace of nirvāṇa.”

original: de nas las kyi rdo rje yis //🔽gsang ba'i mthe bo nas bzung ste //
analyzed: de nas las kyi rdo rje yis // gsang ba'i mthe bo nas bzung ste //
translated: Then, the activity vajra🔽should take hold of the secret thumb

original: yol ba'i nang du gzhug par bya //
analyzed: yol ba'i nang du gzhug par bya //
translated: and lead them inside the curtain.

original: aom padmo sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya yo ga tsitta autpa t'a y'a mi h'um sv'ah'a /
analyzed: aom padmo sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya yo ga tsitta autpa t'a y'a mi h'um sv'ah'a /
translated: oṃ padmo sarva tathāgata samaya yoga citta utpādayā mi hūṃ svāhā

original: de nas gsang ba'i gnas zhugs pas //
analyzed: de nas gsang ba'i gnas zhugs pas //
translated: Then, having entered the secret place,

original: mchod brnyes rgyun bshags la sogs kyis //
analyzed: mchod brnyes rgyun bshags la sogs kyis //
translated: through the offerings, the regular confession, and so forth,🔽one becomes a suitable vessel,

original: snod du rung bar gyur pa dang // dam tshig gsum sgrog chu blud cing //
analyzed: snod du rung bar gyur pa dang // dam tshig gsum sgrog chu blud cing //
translated: the three sacred pledges are proclaimed, water is offered,

original: rdo rje gsang ba'i dam sgrogs shing //
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba'i dam sgrogs shing //
translated: the sacred pledge of the secret vajra is proclaimed,

original: phyag rgyas sngags kyi gnas @145b gsum sbyang //
analyzed: phyag rgyas sngags kyi gnas @145b gsum sbyang //
translated: and the three places are purified with the mantra and mudra.🔽oṃ🔽You are blessed and stabilized

original: aom/ rgyal ba kun gyis khyod nyid ni //🔽byin gyis brlab cing brtan mdzad pas //
analyzed: aom/ rgyal ba kun gyis khyod nyid ni // byin gyis brlab cing brtan mdzad pas //
translated: by all the conquerors.

original: padma gar dbang dkyil 'khor 'dir //
analyzed: padma gar dbang dkyil 'khor 'dir //
translated: In this maṇḍala of Padmanarteśvara,🔽those who have abandoned the sacred pledge of selflessness,🔽who lack faith, whose diligence has declined,🔽whose intelligence is weak and whose wisdom is small,

original: bdag med dam tshig spangs pa dang // dad med brtson 'grus nyams pa dang // blo dman shes rab chung ba dang // blo dman rtog 'dzin la gnas la //
analyzed: bdag med dam tshig spangs pa dang // dad med brtson 'grus nyams pa dang // blo dman shes rab chung ba dang // blo dman rtog 'dzin la gnas la //
translated: and those who are of weak mind and adhere to conceptual grasping,

original: srog gi phyir yang brjod mi bya //
analyzed: srog gi phyir yang brjod mi bya //
translated: should not be told this even at the cost of one’s life.

original: bde chen mgon po pad 'chang sku //
analyzed: bde chen mgon po pad 'chang sku //
translated: The body of Padma Holder, the lord of great bliss,

original: khyod kyi snying la zhugs pa na //
analyzed: khyod kyi snying la zhugs pa na //
translated: has entered your heart.

original: gsang ba'i ye shes gzhan brjod dus //
analyzed: gsang ba'i ye shes gzhan brjod dus //
translated: When speaking of secret pristine consciousness,

original: snying khrag 'thung zhing gzhan du shes //
analyzed: snying khrag 'thung zhing gzhan du shes //
translated: drink the blood of the heart and know it to be other.

original: bdag ni gar gyi dbang phyug sku //
analyzed: bdag ni gar gyi dbang phyug sku //
translated: I am the form of the lord of dance.

original: khyod la thugs rjes gzung byed pas //
analyzed: khyod la thugs rjes gzung byed pas //
translated: Since I am held with compassion for you,

original: nga yis bsgo ba'i tshig 'di dag /
analyzed: nga yis bsgo ba'i tshig 'di dag /
translated: these words that I have spoken

original: 'da' bar rung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'da' bar rung ba ma yin no //
translated: are not to be transgressed.

original: bdag la brnyas shing 'khu byed na //
analyzed: bdag la brnyas shing 'khu byed na //
translated: If you despise and revile me,

original: rab gtum khro bo chen po'i sku //
analyzed: rab gtum khro bo chen po'i sku //
translated: the form of the very wrathful one will

original: klad pa tshal pa brgyar 'gas shing //
analyzed: klad pa tshal pa brgyar 'gas shing //
translated: split your head into a hundred pieces

original: lus sems ngal sogs rdul du byed //
analyzed: lus sems ngal sogs rdul du byed //
translated: and reduce your body and mind to dust.🔽In the maṇḍala of the four places

original: gnas bzhi 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la; ;rang sngags sa bon 'od zer bcas //
analyzed: gnas bzhi 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la; ;rang sngags sa bon 'od zer bcas //
translated: of the seed syllables of one’s mantra and light rays,

original: dbab pa'i gsang sngags lan stong du //🔽dri zhim bdug spos dril bkrol zhing //
analyzed: dbab pa'i gsang sngags lan stong du // dri zhim bdug spos dril bkrol zhing //
translated: recite the secret mantra one thousand times.🔽Light incense, ring the bell,

original: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug par bya //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug par bya //
translated: and cause the gnosis being to enter.

original: des ni mtshan ma'i rtags mthong 'gyur //
analyzed: des ni mtshan ma'i rtags mthong 'gyur //
translated: Then the signs of the symbols will be seen.

original: sku yi ye shes phyogs bcur g-yos //
analyzed: sku yi ye shes phyogs bcur g-yos //
translated: The pristine consciousness of the body moves in the ten directions.

original: gsung gi ye shes gsang ba brjod //
analyzed: gsung gi ye shes gsang ba brjod //
translated: The pristine consciousness of speech speaks the secret.

original: thugs kyi ye shes mngon shes gsal //
analyzed: thugs kyi ye shes mngon shes gsal //
translated: The pristine consciousness of the mind clarifies clairvoyance.

original: sngags gsum phyag rgyas brtan par gnas; ;bden pa'i ye shes byin rlabs kyis //
analyzed: sngags gsum phyag rgyas brtan par gnas; ;bden pa'i ye shes byin rlabs kyis //
translated: By the blessing of the truth of gnosis,

original: dkyil 'khor rigs kyi lha gang yin //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rigs kyi lha gang yin //
translated: Whatever deity of the maṇḍala family

original: bdag gis skal ba ji lta bar //
analyzed: bdag gis skal ba ji lta bar //
translated: Is suitable for me,

original: dus 'dir dbab par mdzad pa rigs //
analyzed: dus 'dir dbab par mdzad pa rigs //
translated: It is fitting to bring it down at this time.

original: nor bu phreng @146a *//
analyzed: nor bu phreng @146a *//
translated: The jewel garland

original: ba gar bab pa //
analyzed: ba gar bab pa //
translated: Is placed wherever it may fall.

original: rigs de rang gi dam tshig nyid //
analyzed: rigs de rang gi dam tshig nyid //
translated: That family is one’s very own pledge.

original: sngags dang phreng ba ma lus pa //
analyzed: sngags dang phreng ba ma lus pa //
translated: The mantra and the entire garland

original: slar nyid de la sbyin par bya //
analyzed: slar nyid de la sbyin par bya //
translated: Are given back to it.🔽By the consecration of the golden scalpel,

original: gser gyi thur ma byin brlabs pas; ;ma rig ldongs pa'i ling tog bsal //
analyzed: gser gyi thur ma byin brlabs pas; ;ma rig ldongs pa'i ling tog bsal //

original: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
translated: All the buddhas of the ten directions

original: khyod kyi mig 'byed brtson par mdzad //
analyzed: khyod kyi mig 'byed brtson par mdzad //

original: ma rig bsgribs g-yogs bsal mdzad nas //
analyzed: ma rig bsgribs g-yogs bsal mdzad nas //

original: padmo spyan bzang dri ma med //
analyzed: padmo spyan bzang dri ma med //

original: aom padma tsakshu dzny'a na pra be sha phat/
analyzed: aom padma tsakshu dzny'a na pra be sha phat/
translated: oṃ padma cakṣu jñāna praveśa phaṭ

original: rdo rjes gdong g-yogs bsal byas nas //
analyzed: rdo rjes gdong g-yogs bsal byas nas //

original: dkyil 'khor gsal ba bstan par bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gsal ba bstan par bya //
translated: The clear maṇḍala is revealed.

original: legs par ltos shig blo gros che //
analyzed: legs par ltos shig blo gros che //
translated: “Look well! Great intellect!

original: sngon gyi rgyal ba la sogs rnams //
analyzed: sngon gyi rgyal ba la sogs rnams //
translated: Just as the previous victors and so forth

original: gsang sngags snying po dkyil 'khor 'dir //
analyzed: gsang sngags snying po dkyil 'khor 'dir //
translated: have entered this maṇḍala of the essence of secret mantra

original: legs par zhugs te grub pa bzhin //
analyzed: legs par zhugs te grub pa bzhin //
translated: and attained accomplishment,

original: me tog gang la bab pa yi; ;lha de rigs kyi dam tshig yin //
analyzed: me tog gang la bab pa yi; ;lha de rigs kyi dam tshig yin //
translated: the deity upon which the flower falls is the pledge of the family.

original: shar gyi sgo srung nas brtsams te //
analyzed: shar gyi sgo srung nas brtsams te //
translated: Beginning with the eastern gate

original: gtso bo'i bar du dkyil 'khor bstan //
analyzed: gtso bo'i bar du dkyil 'khor bstan //

original: zhal zas na bza' la sogs pas //🔽bla ma blo ldan mnyes par bya //
analyzed: zhal zas na bza' la sogs pas // bla ma blo ldan mnyes par bya //

original: yi dam lha sku phyag rgya sogs //
analyzed: yi dam lha sku phyag rgya sogs //

original: gsang ba'i ming dang bcas par bstan //
analyzed: gsang ba'i ming dang bcas par bstan //
translated: are shown together with the secret name.

original: de ring dus nas bzung byas te //
analyzed: de ring dus nas bzung byas te //

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas thob par //
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas thob par //

original: rab rib tha ma'i blo ldan pas //
analyzed: rab rib tha ma'i blo ldan pas //
translated: the one with a mind of the lowest obscuration

original: dus kun tu ni gzung bar bya //
analyzed: dus kun tu ni gzung bar bya //
translated: should always be upheld.

original: kye ma ho blo gros rgya mtsho'i gnas //
analyzed: kye ma ho blo gros rgya mtsho'i gnas //

original: 'gro la bskyab pa'i don brtson la //
analyzed: 'gro la bskyab pa'i don brtson la //
translated: striving for the purpose of protecting migrating beings,

original: khyod zhabs padma la btud de //
analyzed: khyod zhabs padma la btud de //

original: pho brang grong mchog @146b nyams dga' 'dir //
analyzed: pho brang grong mchog @146b nyams dga' 'dir //

original: dbang bskur ba yi rin chen mdzod //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba yi rin chen mdzod //

original: snang mdzad lus la bab pa lags //
analyzed: snang mdzad lus la bab pa lags //

original: rigs bzhin thugs rje brtse dgongs pas //
analyzed: rigs bzhin thugs rje brtse dgongs pas //

original: dri ma'i skyon sol byin brlabs mdzod //
analyzed: dri ma'i skyon sol byin brlabs mdzod //

original: gnang bar mdzad pa'i dus lags pas //
analyzed: gnang bar mdzad pa'i dus lags pas //
translated: This is the time to grant the empowerment,

original: skyob pa'i sku mchog thob par mdzod //
analyzed: skyob pa'i sku mchog thob par mdzod //

original: shar gyi sgo phyogs khru do'i rgyab //
analyzed: shar gyi sgo phyogs khru do'i rgyab //
translated: Behind the eastern door, one cubit,

original: dbang bstan dkyil 'khor dbus kyi tshad //
analyzed: dbang bstan dkyil 'khor dbus kyi tshad //
translated: In the center of the mandala of the empowerment,

original: padma 'dab brgyad sgo dang bcas //
analyzed: padma 'dab brgyad sgo dang bcas //
translated: An eight-petaled lotus with a door,

original: dmar po'i tshon gyis legs byugs te //
analyzed: dmar po'i tshon gyis legs byugs te //

original: seng+ge'i khri bshams padmor bcas //🔽'khor lo sgyur rgyal tshul gyis bzhag /
analyzed: seng+ge'i khri bshams padmor bcas // 'khor lo sgyur rgyal tshul gyis bzhag /
translated: With a lion throne and lotus,🔽Arranged in the manner of a universal monarch.

original: spyi bor gdugs mdzes rgyal mtshan g-yas //
analyzed: spyi bor gdugs mdzes rgyal mtshan g-yas //
translated: A beautiful parasol on the head, victory banners on the right,

original: dung dang zangs dung sil snyan rnams //
analyzed: dung dang zangs dung sil snyan rnams //
translated: Conches, copper horns, and cymbals,

original: rol cha mchod cha phyogs mtshams dgod //
analyzed: rol cha mchod cha phyogs mtshams dgod //

original: rgyan phreng gos kyis legs klubs pa //
analyzed: rgyan phreng gos kyis legs klubs pa //
translated: Well-covered with ornaments, garlands, and clothes,🔽Purify with scented water, mantra, white mustard seeds,

original: dri chu sngags bcas yungs kar dang // ku sha'i chu yis dag par bya //
analyzed: dri chu sngags bcas yungs kar dang // ku sha'i chu yis dag par bya //
translated: And water with kuśa grass.

original: aom ma h'a bin ta ha na  ha na h'um phat/
analyzed: aom ma h'a bin ta ha na  ha na h'um phat/
translated: Oṃ mahāvinta hana hana hūṃ phaṭ.

original: de nas rigs kyi lhar bskyed de //
analyzed: de nas rigs kyi lhar bskyed de //
translated: Then, having generated the deity of the family,

original: bkra shis dag pa'i glu blangs shing //
analyzed: bkra shis dag pa'i glu blangs shing //
translated: one should sing the song of the pure auspiciousness

original: rol mo rgyan phreng bkod byas te //
analyzed: rol mo rgyan phreng bkod byas te //
translated: and arrange the ornaments, garlands, and music.

original: bum pa'i chu yis dbang bskur bya //
analyzed: bum pa'i chu yis dbang bskur bya //
translated: One should confer empowerment with the water of the vase.🔽Therefore, the accumulations of obscurations

original: de yi phyir ni sgrib tshogs dang; ;bag chags nyon mongs gnas dag nas //
analyzed: de yi phyir ni sgrib tshogs dang; ;bag chags nyon mongs gnas dag nas //
translated: and the afflictions of the traces are purified.

original: lha yi chu rgyun dag pa'i mthus //
analyzed: lha yi chu rgyun dag pa'i mthus //
translated: By the power of the pure stream of the deity’s water,

original: ye shes phung po dbang phyug mchog /
analyzed: ye shes phung po dbang phyug mchog /
translated: the supreme lord of the aggregate of pristine consciousness🔽is empowered.

original: aom lha yi chu ni dag pa'i chu //
analyzed: aom lha yi chu ni dag pa'i chu //
translated: oṃ The water of the deity is pure water,🔽arisen from the place of the three secrets of the vajra,

original: rdo rje gsang gsum gnas las byung; ;byang sems chu yis tshogs rnams dag /
analyzed: rdo rje gsang gsum gnas las byung; ;byang sems chu yis tshogs rnams dag /
translated: the water of bodhicitta that purifies the accumulations.

original: dbang bskur ba yi don thob mdzod //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba yi don thob mdzod //
translated: Please attain the meaning of empowerment.

original: yon tan rin chen rnam dag mchog /
analyzed: yon tan rin chen rnam dag mchog /
translated: The supreme, pure, precious qualities

original: rigs lnga'i sku rgyan byas pa yi //
analyzed: rigs lnga'i sku rgyan byas pa yi //
translated: are adorned with the bodies of the five families.

original: dbu rgyan bzang po'i @147a *//
analyzed: dbu rgyan bzang po'i @147a *//
translated: The excellent crown

original: cod pan bcas //
analyzed: cod pan bcas //
translated: is crowned with a crest.

original: kun 'byung rin chen phung po mchog /
analyzed: kun 'byung rin chen phung po mchog /
translated: The supreme, pure, precious aggregate of the source of all

original: tram/ yon tan ma bcas pa yi rgyan //
analyzed: tram/ yon tan ma bcas pa yi rgyan //
translated: is the ornament of unadulterated qualities.

original: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed //
analyzed: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed //
translated: It illuminates the maṇḍala of the family.

original: khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po che //
analyzed: khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po che //
translated: The great Dharma king of the three realms🔽is empowered with the great, pure, precious qualities.

original: mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzob kun //
analyzed: mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzob kun //
translated: The major and minor marks are all relative.

original: ye nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa //
analyzed: ye nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa //
translated: The five-pronged vajra is primordial.

original: 'od phreng sngags kyis brgyan byas pa'i //
analyzed: 'od phreng sngags kyis brgyan byas pa'i //
translated: The garland of light is adorned with mantras.

original: rtogs bcas tshogs rnams kun las rgyal //
analyzed: rtogs bcas tshogs rnams kun las rgyal //
translated: It is victorious over all conceptual gatherings.

original: bde gshegs thugs rje rtse gcig pas //
analyzed: bde gshegs thugs rje rtse gcig pas //
translated: The single-pointed compassion of the sugatas

original: khams gsum gnas rnams dor mi mdzad //
analyzed: khams gsum gnas rnams dor mi mdzad //

original: byang sems rdo rje rtse lnga pa //
analyzed: byang sems rdo rje rtse lnga pa //
translated: The five-pronged vajra of bodhicitta🔽clarifies the location of the wisdom of self-awareness.

original: rang rig ye shes gnas gsal byed; ;chos rnams skye ba med pa'i don //
analyzed: rang rig ye shes gnas gsal byed; ;chos rnams skye ba med pa'i don //
translated: The meaning of the nonarising of phenomena🔽is the great, pure, pristine consciousness of the vajra.
